SA15dhnyabpu:6: siddhi prāhuḥparāṃ, tasmai pravāce munaye namaḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:13: sarva eva hi viśiṣṭo janaḥ śāstrārambhe sveṣṭhadevatāstutiṃ kṛtavān /
SA15dhnyabpu:17: śrotṛṇāṃ stutipuraḥsarayā pravṛttyā puṇyātiśayotpādanāt pārārthya cālocya buddhasya bhagavataḥ stutimārabdhavān- jayantītyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:18: anena ślokena buddhasya bhagavata eva pūjā stotrataḥ, nānyepām nirdiṣṭaguṇodbhavāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:19: stotramapi sva- parārthasampattyai sambhāvtīti pūrva svārthasampada bhagavatī darsahyati jayanti jātivyasanetyādinā sugataparyantenaḥ manastamastānabetyādinā parārthasampadam /
SA15dhnyabpu:23: suśabdo 'tra śobhane, atiśaye, apunarāvṛtau ca vartateḥ anekārthatvāt nipātānām /
SA15dhnyabpu:28: 'samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapruṣārthasiddhiriti tadvayutpādayate' iti prathamavākyenāsya prakaraṇasya sambandha-prayojana-abhiveyāni,
SA15dhnyabpu:30: tathā hi sambandha prayojana abhidheyānāmabhāve prakaraṇaśāstrarmadaṃ prekṣāpūrva[dha] samyagjñānapūrviketyādinā asya prakaraṇasyābhidheya- prayojanamucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:35: sa ādiryeṣāṃ dveṣādīnāṃ te rāgādayo bhavanti kleśāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:43: jātau vyasanamiti "saptamī' (pā sū 2 1 40) iti yogavibhāgāt samāsaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:51: jātivyasanasya prabandhaḥ=pravāhaḥ, tasya prasūtiḥ= prasavaḥ, utpattiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:52: tasyā hetuḥ= kāraṇam, jagat tasya jagato vijeturiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:56: kiṃviśiṣṭā vāco jayanti? ityāha- manastama ityād /
SA15dhnyabpu:59: tama iti kṛtvā na gamatayā tamo 'ndhakārī dhaṭādipratibandhaṃ karoti /
SA15dhnyabpu:62: manastamasi tānavam, ṣaṣṭhī- samāso vā vacana pramātho draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:63: manastamastānavamādadhānāḥ=tanutvaṃ kurvāṇāḥ sakalajanasya śruticintābhāvanākrameṇa sugatasya vācaḥ sutra abhidharma vinayasvabhāvāḥ jayanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:65: yasmād bhagavatpravacane pramāṇaparicinna upāyo vimukti lakṣaṇaśca upāyo nirdiśyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:66: teṣāṃ cāgama upāyopeyayoḥ pramāṇarahitatvāt tato bhagavata eva vāco jayanti,
SA15dhnyabpu:74: tatra tad vyutpādayate ityanena abhidheyaṃ prayojanaṃ ca sākṣādukte /
SA15dhnyabpu:76: etacca tatra sāmarthyam- samyagjñānapratipādanārtha prakaraṇārambhād arthād prakaraṇamupāya eveti darśitam anyathā yadi upāyo na syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:81: tacca vyutpattayātmakaṃ samyagjñānapratipādanamanena kriyata iti prakaraṇamidaṃ tasyārthasya sādhanaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:85: tena prakaraṇaṃ sādhanam, samyagjñāna parijñānaṃ ca upāyasādhyamiti sthitiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:86: sa ca sādhya sādhanalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇa eva /
SA15dhnyabpu:87: tathā ca prakaraṇaṃ sādhanaṃ, phalaṃ ca sādhyamḥ prakāṇaṃ kāraṇam, phalaṃ ca kāryamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:89: athaivaṃ sthite 'pi, yadi kaścit pṛcchati- ko 'rthaḥ samyagjñānabyutpādane?
SA15dhnyabpu:92: mā bhūdupadeśaḥ, kimarthamayaṃ śrama iti? tasmādāha- samyagjñānapūrvikāṃ sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiriti /
SA15dhnyabpu:94: tatrāyaṃ vākyārthaḥ- yasmāt sarvapuruṣārtha dvividhaṃ hi prakaraṇaśarīram- śabdaḥ arthaśca /
SA15dhnyabpu:95: tatra śabdasya svābhidheyapratipādanameva prayojanam, nānyat / atastanna nirūpyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:98: sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ prayojanaṃ yena syāt prayojana prayojanam,
SA15dhnyabpu:99: tena ca prayojana prayojanamākhyātamiti dūṣitam sāmarthyāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:100: atha kasmāt prakaraṇasyābhidheyaprayojanamityuktam, na punaḥ prakaraṇasya śarīra prayojanam?
SA15dhnyabpu:102: yato dvividhaṃ prakaraṇasya śarīraṃ prakaraṇasya svabhāvaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:104: nanu yathābhidheyasya prayojanaṃ cintyate, tathā śabdasyāpi kimiti na cintyate? ityāha- tatretyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:115: arthakriyāyāṃ yadavisaṃvādakaṃ tadabhrāntam, tadeva ca samyagjñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:117: iṣṭaśca prakaraṇārambhaḥ sautrāntikaḥ yogācārobhayanayānu abhidheyaṃ tu yadi nipprayojanaṃ syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:119: yathā kākadantaprayojanābhāvāt na tatparīkṣā ārambhaṇīyā prekṣāvatā /
SA15dhnyabpu:123: atra ca prakaraṇābhidheyasya samaygjñānasya sarvapuruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ prayojanamuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:125: tathā hi- 'puruṣārthopayogi samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādayitavyamanena prakaraṇena' iti bruvatā samyagjñānamaraya śabdasandarbhasya abhidheyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:129: na tvidamekaṃ vākayaṃ sambandham, abhidheyaṃ, prayojanaṃ ca vaktuṃ sākṣāt samartham /
SA15dhnyabpu:130: ekaṃ tu vadat trayaṃ sākṣāt sāmarthyād darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:137: nanu ca yatrābhidheyaprayojanaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttāvaṅga tathā samvandhādīnyapi,
SA15dhnyabpu:140: asminnabhidheyaprayojane kathite tānyapi sāmarthyāt kathitāni bhavantītyarhtaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:144: abhidheyaprayojanameva sakṣād vācyatayā nirdiśyate, abhidheyādīni tu tadviśeṣaṇatayā /
SA15dhnyabpu:147: na caikena vākyenārthatrayaṃ sākṣāchakyate darśayitumiti darśayati- na tvidamityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:148: ekaṃ tvittyādivākyaṃ prādhānyenaikaṃ vadadabhidheyavyutpattiprayojanasambandhārthatrayaṃ pratipadayati tatra tadityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:154: yasmāt kāraṇaṃ pūrva kāryasya, tasmāt tat pūrvamityucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:161: sarva iti sannikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭa laukika lokottara heyopādeyopekṣaṇīyāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:166: heyaḥ aniṣṭaḥ, ahi kaṇṭaka viṣa śūlādilakṣaṇaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:167: upādeya iṣṭaḥ, strak candana vasanāśana tatra tad ityābhidheyam, vyutpādyate iti prayojanapadam /
SA15dhnyabpu:168: prayojane cātra vaktuḥ prakaraṇakaraṇavyāpārasya cintyate, śrotuśca śravaṇavyāpārasya /
SA15dhnyabpu:169: tathā hi- sarve prekṣāvantaḥ pravṛttiprayojanamanviṣya pravartante /
SA15dhnyabpu:170: tataścācāryeṇa prakaraṇe kimartha kṛtam, śrotṛbhiśca kimartha śrūyate?
SA15dhnyabpu:172: samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyamānānāmātmānaṃ vyutpādakaṃ kartu prakaraṇamidaṃ kṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:173: śiṣyaiścācāryaprayuktāmātmano vyutpattimiccadbhiḥ prakaraṇamidaṃ śrūyata iti prakaraṇakaraṇa śravaṇayo prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:174: sambandhapradarśanapadaṃ tu na bidyate / sāmarthyādeva tu sa pratipattavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:175: vyutpattiḥ kriyata ityevaṃ yujyate vaktum kimiti atdvayutpādyate iti ṇicā nirdeśa iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:178: vakturiti śāstrakartu śrotuśca prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ vintyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:179: yasmād dvayorapi vaktṛśrotrostatra prakaraṇe prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇāsyo vyāpārau staḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:183: yasmādanena samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādayate ityatra vākye vyutpattikriyāniṣpattau karaṇaśravaṇakriyādvayakartavyatayā praviṣṭam /
SA15dhnyabpu:184: tacca vyutpattikaraṇa śāstrakārasyaiva nānyasyeti ṇicā nidarśitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:185: yasmāt samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādyamānān śiṣyān prerayati- vyutpāditaṃ samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyadhvam iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:187: tasmād vaktureva karaṇavyāpārasya prayojana vyutpādanam, na bhājanādīnām /
SA15dhnyabpu:189: tathāpi na tāni vyutpādakāniḥ teṣāṃ śiṣyaviṣaye prerakatvābhāvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:191: yasmāchiṣyā ācāryaprayuktāṃ vyutpattimātmanaḥ sambandhinī kartumichanti yataste pracidyāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:192: tasmāt tat prakaraṇaṃ taiḥ śrūyate iti śravaṇasya prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:194: anyathā asādhāraṇavyāpāro vakturvyutpattau na darśitaḥ syāt, śiṣyāṇāṃ śravaṇavyāpāraśca /
SA15dhnyabpu:195: yasmāt sarva eva prayojakaparatantro pāna śayyāsanalakṣaṇaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:198: tathāhi- pratyakṣādijñānena virdhārya śūla viṣa kaṇṭha kādikaṃ pariharati puṣpamālyādikamādatte,
SA15dhnyabpu:200: prekṣāvatā hi samyagjñānavyutpādanāya prakaraṇamidamārabdhavatā ayamevipāyo nānya iti darśita evopāyopeyabhāvaḥ prakaraṇaprayojanayoḥ sambandha iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:201: nanu ca prakaraṇaśravaṇāt prāguktānyapi abhidheyādīni pramāṇābhāvāt prekṣāvadbhirna gṛhyante,
SA15dhnyabpu:203: satyam aśrute prakaraṇe kathitānyapi na niścauyante /
SA15dhnyabpu:204: ukteṣu tvapramāṇakeṣvapi abhidheyādiṣu saṃśaya utpadyate, saṃśayācca pravartante /
SA15dhnyabpu:210: svatantrāṇāṃ cācāryaprayukta vyutpattimaniccatāṃ śravaṇābhāvāt kathaṃ śravaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ cintyate?- iti syitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:211: nanu ca yathābhidheyavyutpādanaprayojanayorapoddhāreṇa pratipādakapadaṃ kathaṃ sambandhasyāpi kimīt na kathitam?
SA15dhnyabpu:213: ayameva prakaraṇaviśeṣo laghūpāyatayā vakṣyamāṇaya nītyopāyaḥ vyutpādanam= upeyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:215: sa ca pratīyata iti na padāntareṇa kathitaḥ / tathā coktam-
SA15dhnyabpu:218: evamādivākyenābhidheyaprayojanādau kathite sati prāmāṇikānāṃ prabṛttau tadasaṅgata emveti manyamānaścodayati- nanvityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:219: evaṃ manyate- yo hi prāmāṇikaḥ, sa pramāṇe pravartate /
SA15dhnyabpu:220: na cādivākye prayojanādinā kathitena śāstraśravaṇāt prāgvartate śāstram, ādivākyasyāprāmāṇyāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:228: yo hi samaygjñānārthī sa tathābhutaṃ śāstrakartu rādivākyaṃ śrutvātatra saṃśete,
SA15dhnyabpu:235: tena sarvapuruṣārthasiddhau niścitameva samyagjñānaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhavatīti pradarśitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:236: itiśabdaḥ vyākhyātaṇāṃ hi vacana krīḍādyarthamanyathāpi sambhāvyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:237: śastrakṛtāṃ tu prakaraṇaprārambhe na viparītabhidheyādyabhidhāne prayojanamutpaśyāmaḥ, nāpi pravṛttim /
SA15dhnyabpu:245: etāsu cānarthasambhāvanāsu ekasyāmapyanarthasambhavanāyām na prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante /
SA15dhnyabpu:248: iti prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyaṅgamarthasambhāvanāṃ kartu sambandhādīnyabhidhīyanta iti sthitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:250: tena yaduktaṃ kenacid- 'vyākhyānakārā eva prayojanādīni pratipādayaisaynti' iti, tat pratyuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:251: utpaśyāma ityādinaitad darśayati- yadyapi pramāṇaṃ nāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:253: nanu ca vādhakasādhakapramāṇābhāvāt samyagjñānavyutpattyarthī vināpi āvidacanena saṃśayānastatra pravartate- iti kimādivākyena tatroktena?
SA15dhnyabpu:255: evaṃ manyate- yo hyamūḍhaḥ, taṃ prati na kartavyameva /
SA15dhnyabpu:260: kathite ca vacane śāstrakāreṇa tadanurodhād vacanādarthasaṃśayo jāyate, tataḥ pravartata ityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:262: ato vā prakaraṇādanyasya prakaraṇasya laghutaropāyatāṃ sambhāvyāsya prakaraṇasyasāratayā anupāyatā syādityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:263: evaṃ samudāyena vākyasya tātparya vyākhyāyāvayavārtha darśayitumāha- avisaṃvādakamityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:264: 'avisaṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ' iti bruvatā ṭīkākṛtā arthāvabodhakaṃ jñānaṃ mīmāṃsakaparikalpitam,
SA15dhnyabpu:266: athāpi viparītaṃ jñānaṃ kaiścit parikalpitaṃ samyaktvena,
SA15dhnyabpu:269: yathā na ca tāni samyagjñānāni, tathā svayaṃ ṭīkāyāmapahastitāni /
SA15dhnyabpu:277: tathā hi- na jñānaṃ janayad artha prāpayati, api tvarthe puruṣaṃ pravartayat prāpayatyartham /
SA15dhnyabpu:279: na hi puruṣaṃ haṭhāt pravartayituṃ śaknoti vijñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:282: tathā ca sati arthādhigamāt samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāraḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:284: yenaiva hi jñānena prathamamadhigato 'rthaḥ, tenaiva pravartita pruruṣaḥ, prāpitaścārthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:285: tatreva ca arthe kimanyena jñānenādhikaṃ kāryam /
SA15dhnyabpu:287: tatra yo 'rtho dṛṣṭatvena jñāttaḥ sa pratyakṣeṇa pravṛttiviṣayīkṛtaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:289: tasya ekasminnevārthe trayāṇāṃ jñānātāṃ pradarśaka pravartaka prāpakabhedena prāmāṇyamiṣṭaṃ pareṇa,
SA15dhnyabpu:292: pradarśite cārthe prathamena darśakena jñānena yad dvitīyaṃ jñānaṃ tatraivārthe puruṣasya pravarttakam,
SA15dhnyabpu:299: yat pradarśakamādāvutpannamarthe jñānaṃ tadeva pravṛttiviṣayaṃ karoti,
SA15dhnyabpu:308: evaṃ satyanyat pradarśakapramāṇamḥ anyat pravartanādikaphalam? na caivam, tasmād yuktamuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:309: nanu ca yadyapyarthādhigatireva pramāṇaphalaṃ tathāpi yāvaduttare pravartaka-prāpakajñane na bhavataḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:311: evaṃ manyate- adhigate cārthe samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāra iti tayoḥ prāmāṇye karttavye 'nupayogitvam, ato 'pramāṇe te /
SA15dhnyabpu:312: kathaṃ samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāraḥ ko vāsau? ityāha- ata eveti /
SA15dhnyabpu:314: sa ca niścayaḥ prathamayā cārthādhigatyā kṛta iti samāpto tadvayutpādyata iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:315: atra taditi samyagjñānaṃ yojanīyam napusaṃkaliṅgena svarupanirdeśāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:317: pradarśakaṃ pratyakṣam tasmād dṛṣṭatayā jñātaḥ pratyakṣadarśitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:324: ābhyāṃ pramāṇābhyāmanyena ca jñānena darśito 'rthaḥ kaścid atyanta vipartyastaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:325: yathā- marīcikāsu jalamḥ sa cāsatvāt prāptumaśakyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:327: na ca bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ yukto 'rtho jagatyastiḥ tataḥ prāptumaśakyastādṛśaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:334: evam sāmānyena saṃvādakaṃ samyagjñānaṃ pratipādya viśeṣeṇa ca pratyakṣānumāne svavyāpāraṃ kurvatī samyagjñāne bhavata iti darśayannāha- tatra yo 'rtha ityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:339: etaduktaṃ bhavati- pratibhāsamānārthavyavasāyaṃ kurvat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ samvādakanityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:342: tacca vahnayavyabhivāridhūmaniścayanaṃ sāmānyena sādhyābinābhāvi ca smaraṇajñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:343: yathā dhūmaṃpratyakṣeṇa gṛhītvā sarvatra ayaṃ vahnijaḥ iti smaraṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:345: tadanumānaṃ viśiṣṭasambandhena yadudeti jñānam, yathā atratyo dhūmo vahnijaḥ iti jānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:347: anumānasya tuliṅgadarśanāt svaviṣaye niścayātmanotpattireva niścayavyāpāra iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:348: tathā ce yādinā anayordaśitaṃ vyāpāraṃ spaṣṭayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:349: ata ete pramāṇe nānyadvijñānam ityevaṃ bruvatā ete eva samyagjñāne nānyāni śabdādīni /
SA15dhnyabpu:351: yathaite pramāṇe, saśayādijñānaṃ na tathā pramāṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:353: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yathā pratyakṣānumāne svenasvena pramāṇenopadarśitārthasya prāpake,
SA15dhnyabpu:355: sarveṇa cāliṅgajena vikalpena vinyāmakamadṛṣṭvā pravṛttena bhavābhāvayo raniyata evārtho darśayitavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:358: bhāvābhāvāniyataṃ cārtha darśa yat apramāṇam anyad vijñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:364: tatra pradarśitādanyad vastu bhinnākāram, bhinnakālam, bhinnadeśaṃ ca /
SA15dhnyabpu:367: yasmādanyākāravadvastugrāhi nākārāntaravati vastuni pramāṇam yathā prītaśaṅkhagrāhi śukle śaṅkha /
SA15dhnyabpu:368: deśāntarasthagrāhi ca na deśāntarasthe pramāṇam yathā- kuñcikāvivaradiśasthāyāṃ maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇigrāhi jñānaṃ nāpavarakasye maṇau /
SA15dhnyabpu:369: kālāntarayyuktagrāhi ca na kālāntaravarti vastuni pramāṇam yathā ardharātre madhyāhnakālavastugrāhi svapnajñānaṃ ardharātrakāle vastuni pramāṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:370: nanu ca mā bhūt saṃśaryāvaparyajñanayoḥ prāmāṇyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:371: tathābhūtasyārthasyāsattvāditiḥ yat punaḥ iha kūpe jalam iti jñānaṃ tat pramāṇāntaraṃ kimiti na bhavati?
SA15dhnyabpu:378: evaṃ manyate- yadayapi sākṣāt saṃśayajñānaṃ na pratīyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:379: yastu saṃśayavikalpakasya jñānasya iha kūpe jalam ityevañjātīyasyaḥ tathāpi niyāmakaṃ liṅgamantareṇa tadapramāṇam,
SA15dhnyabpu:381: tataścāyamarthaḥ- syāt kadācit kūpe jalam iti taccaivaṃ svarūpam, tat saṃśayajñānamevetyapramāṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:382: yat punastatra pravṛttena kadācijjalaṃ labhayate tajjñānāntarāditi viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ pratipāditam /
SA15dhnyabpu:383: nanu ca yadayapi saṃśayādīnāmupadarśitasyārthasya prāpakatvaṃ nāsti, kiṃ tāni na vyutpādayante?
SA15dhnyabpu:391: ākāraniyataṃ ca prāpayitu śakyam yatkālaṃ tu pariccinnaṃ tatkālaṃ na śakyaṃ prāpayitum?
SA15dhnyabpu:392: nocyate- yasminneva kāle pariccidayate tasminneva kāle prāpayitavyamiti,
SA15dhnyabpu:395: kintu yatkālaṃ pariccinnaṃ tadeva tena prāpaṇīyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:399: kāraṇaśabdopādāne tu pruṣārthasiddhaḥ sākṣāt kāraṇaṃ gamyeta /
SA15dhnyabpu:401: dvividhaṃ ca samyagjñānam, arthakriyānirbhāsam, arthakriyāasmarthe ca pravartakam /
SA15dhnyabpu:403: tacca pūrvamātram, na tu sākṣāt kāraṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:404: samyagjñāne hi sati pūrvadṛṣṭasmaraṇam, smaraṇādabhilāṣaḥ abhilāṣāt pravṛttiḥ, pravatteśca prāptiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:408: evaṃ manyate- ebhirupadarśitasyārthasya pītākārasya kuñjikāvivarasthasya maṇairniyatadeśasya,
SA15dhnyabpu:415: evaṃ manyate codakaḥ- deśākrābhyāṃ niyatasya prāptuṃ śakyatvāda bhavatvanyākārasyānyadeśasya ca prāptāvapramāṇam,
SA15dhnyabpu:418: tataśca yathā satyanīle nīlajñānasyānyo grāhyakālo 'nyaśca prāpyakālaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:421: nocyate ityādinā siddhāntavādī tvevaṃ manyate- satyaṃ kṣaṇabhedena vastuno bhedo 'styevaḥ kintu kṣaṇāpekṣayā na prāmānyalakṣaṇamucyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:423: tataśca nīlādo ya eva santānaḥ pariccinno nīlajñānena, sa eva tena prāpitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:425: na tathā sthūlakālabhedena pradarśitasya putrasya svaptnajñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:432: kathaṃ pūrvaśabdaḥ kāraṇe vartate? ityāha- kāryādityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:433: kāraṇaśabda eva kasmānnakṛtaḥ? ityāha- kāraṇaśabda ityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:434: kima arthakriyānirbhāsaṃ tu yadyapi sākṣātprāptiḥ tathāpi tanna parīkṣyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:435: yatraiva hi prekṣāvanto 'rthinaḥ sāśaṅkāḥ, yat parīkṣyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:436: arthakriyānirbhāse ca jñāte sati siddhaḥ puruṣārthaḥ, tena tatra na sāśaṅkā arthinaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:438: tasmāt parīkṣārhamasākṣāt kāraṇaṃ samyagjñānamādarśayituṃ kāraṇaśabdaṃ parityajya pūrvagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:440: arthyate iti arthaḥ, kāmyate iti yāvat /
SA15dhnyabpu:444: upekṣaṇīyo hyanupādeyatvād heya nantakāraṇaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:458: tat prāpitaheyopādayānuṣṭhāan vyavhārāpekṣayā pravartakamiti vyavahitaṃ sādhananirbhāsajñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:459: yadyevama, anantarameva kimiti na parīkṣayate? ityāha- aytraiva hītyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:460: yatraiva jñāne 'rthakriyāsamarthavastupravartaka puruṣasya sandehaḥ, tadeva parīkṣyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:462: tayoranubhave sati sādhanajñānāt pravatituṃ vā yujyata iti na praikṣārham /
SA15dhnyabpu:469: tena hya vaṃ vyākayātam arthaśabdena prayojanamucyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:472: taccāyuktam yasmādarthasya dārupākāderna samyagjñānānniṣpattiḥ, kiṃ tarhi?
SA15dhnyabpu:473: svahetoreva vahnayādeḥ dharmottaravyākhyāne tu heyopādeyārthaviṣayā yā siddhiḥ= anuṣṭhitiḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:475: amumevārtha darśayiṣyati heyasya ca hānamanuṣthānam iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:476: nanu ca heyopādeyāgbhyāmanyo 'pyupekṣaṇī'sti, tasya kimiti na kathanam? eva /
SA15dhnyabpu:483: sarvaśabda iha dravyakārtsnye vṛttaḥ, na tu prakārakātsnrye /
SA15dhnyabpu:485: api tvayamarthaḥ- yā kācit siddhiḥ sā sarvā kṛtsnaivāsau samyagjñānanibandhaneti /
SA15dhnyabpu:487: tathā hi yadi pradarśitamartha prāpayati, evaṃ tato bhavatyarthasiddhiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:489: pradarśitaṃ cāprāpayat miethyajñānam aprāpakaṃ ca kathamarthasiddhinibandhanaṃ syāt tasmād yanmithyājñānaṃ na tato 'rthasiddhiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:491: ata eva samyagjñānaṃ yatnato vyutpādanīyam yatastadeva puruṣārthasiddhinibandhanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:492: tato yāvadū brūyāta-yā kācit puruṣārthasiddhiḥ sā samyagjñānanibandhanaiveti,
SA15dhnyabpu:495: tadayamarthaḥ- yasmāt samyagityāha- na ca heyetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:496: evaṃ manyate- satyamasti, kintu tasyānupādeyatvād heyatvameveti na pṛthakkathanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:497: tena yaduktaṃ kaiścit- heyopādeyayoḥ puruṣārthopayogitvāt kathanam,
SA15dhnyabpu:498: upekṣaṇīyasya tadviparyamānna kathanam iti, tat pratyuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:518: tato yāvad brūyādityādinopasaṃhāravyājenevaśabdena prayuktenāvadhāraṇārthavācinā yāvānarthastāvāneva sarvaśabdena prayuktena kṛtsnārthavācinā bhavatīti darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:529: jñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ tasmāt tat samyagjñānaṃ vyupādayate /
SA15dhnyabpu:534: caturvidhā cātra vipratipattiḥ saṃkhyā lakṣaṇa gocara phalaviṣayā /
SA15dhnyabpu:539: tasyāḥ prādhānyāt taccabdena sambandho yukto na samyagjñanasya?
SA15dhnyabpu:541: evaṃ manyate- śabdārthī hi dvividhaḥ śābdaḥ, pratipādayaśca /
SA15dhnyabpu:547: nāpi doṣāpanayanam, na hayanena prakaraṇena doṣo 'panetu śakyate, akārakatvādasya /
SA15dhnyabpu:551: evaṃ manyate- vipratipattinirākaraṇadvāreṇa samyagjñānasvarūpaṃ jñāpyate 'nena prakaraṇeneti // 1 //
SA15dhnyabpu:561: svarūpavipratipattiryathā- keṣāñcit pratyakṣaṃ savikalpakam / keṣāñcit nirvikalpakamīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:567: tasmāt tādṛśavipratipatticatuṣṭhayanirākaraṇena srvathā abhāntatayā samyagjñanasvarūpaṃ pratipāditaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:568: tatra ca prathamameva saṅkhayāvipratipattinirākaraṇārthamuktam- dvividhaṃ samyagjñānamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:574: vyaktibhede ca pradarśite prativyaktiniyataṃ samyagjñānalakṣaṇamākhyātuṃ śakyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:575: apradarśite tu vyaktibhede sakalavyaktyanuyāyi samyagjñānalakṣaṇamekaṃ na śakyaṃ vaktum /
SA15dhnyabpu:577: apradarśite tu vyaktibhedātmake saṃkhyāhede lakṣaṇabhedasya darśayitumaśakyatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:582: prāptāpannālaṅgatisamāseṣu paravalliṅgapratiṣedhāt abhidheyavalliṅge sati sarvaliṅgaḥ pratyakṣaśabdaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:583: nanu ca samyagjñānasya lakṣaṇe kathite sati paścāt tadbhedaḥ pradarśayitu yujyate- ityambhutalakṣaṇaṃ samyagjñānaṃ dvividhamiti,
SA15dhnyabpu:587: kintvatra saṃkhyābhede 'kathite samyagjñānasya lakṣaṇameva na śakyate kathayitum,
SA15dhnyabpu:588: ataḥ pratyakṣasyānyallakṣaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ śakyate kathayitumityato lakṣaṇāṅgamevādau saṃkhyābhedakathanamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:589: nanu ca pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca iti nirdeśād dvividhamiti labdham, kimartha dvividhagrahaṇam?
SA15dhnyabpu:590: ucyate dvividhameva samyagjñānam ityavadhāraṇārtham, tenaikatricaturā saṃkhyā nirastā syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:591: asati dvitvakathane pratyakṣānumāne tāvat sambhavati'nyānyapi pramāṇāni bhaviṣyantīti syādāśaṅkā // 2 //
SA15dhnyabpu:593: akṣamakṣaṃ prati pratyakṣamityavyayībhāvasamāsaḥ, kasmānna pradarśyate 'yaṃ samāsaḥ?
SA15dhnyabpu:602: tatra gamanaṃ gotvasyopalakṣaṇam, tasmād gotvāścayapiṇḍo gośabdābhiveya ityupārśyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:603: tathātrāpi indriyāśritatvena jñānaviṣayasya pratyakṣakārakatvasūcanāt pratyakṣacatuṣṭhayameva pratyakṣatvenāśrīyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:609: akṣāśritatvaṃ ca vyutpattinimittaṃ śabdasya, na tu pravṛttinimittam /
SA15dhnyabpu:611: tadeva śabdasya pravṛttinimittam tataścayatkiñcidarśasya sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣamucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:612: yadi tvakṣāśritatvameva pravṛttinimittaṃ syāt, indriyavijñānameva pratyakṣamucyeta, na mānasādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:613: yathā gaccatoti gauḥ iti gamanakriyāyāṃ vyutpādito 'pi gośabdo gamanakriyopalakṣitamekārthasamavetaṃ gotvaṃpravṛttinimittī karoti /
SA15dhnyabpu:614: yathā ca gaccatyagaccati ca gavi gośabdaḥ siddho bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:618: gṛhote pakṣadharma, smṛte ca sādhyasādhanasambandhe 'numānaṃ pravartate iti paścātkālabhāvi ucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:621: pratyakṣo ghaṭaiti na syātḥ idameva syātpratyakṣājñānam,
SA15dhnyabpu:624: nanu ca pratigatamakṣamityasyāṃ vyutpattāvakṣāśritasyaividnriyajñanasya pratyakṣaśabdavācyatā syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:632: apapi paścānmānamanumānamityavyayībhāvasamāse pūrvaccodayamudbhāvya gatisamāsa āśrayitavyaḥ- anugataṃ mānamanumānamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:633: paścādityarthakathanaṃ kṛtam, na tasmin vākye samāsaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:639: yathā pratyakṣāmarthenotpannaṃ sad abhrāntamiti pramāṇaṃ bhavativ tathānumānamapi tādātmyadutpattibhyāmarthapratibandhādabhrāntamiti tat pramāṇaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:640: etena yaduvata kaiścit- sarveṣu pramāṇeṣu mukhyaṃ pratyakṣam iti tannirastam /
SA15dhnyabpu:641: abhrāntatvamubhayorapi samānameva / pratipāditaṃ hi kenacit pratyakṣasya mukhyatvam // 3 //
SA15dhnyabpu:646: tena kalpanāpoḍhamabhrāntaṃ yad bhavati tadeva pratyakṣaṃ viditavyam ityartha ukto bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:651: tato 'yaṃ vākyārthaḥ- tatra tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayoriti samudāyanirdeśaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:653: cakāraḥ pratyakṣānumānayostulyavalatvaṃ samuccinotītyādinā yaduvataṃ śabarasvāmiprabhṛtibhiḥ- pratyakṣaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nānumānam,
SA15dhnyabpu:654: tathā coktaṃ mīsāṃsābhāsye- pratyakṣe valīyasi kathamanumānam iti tat prayuktam yato dvayorapi svavyāpāre tulyabalatbam /
SA15dhnyabpu:657: tābhyāmevaṃ vyākhyātam- pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca iti bhinnavibhaktinirdeśo 'rthād viṣayabhedaṃ darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:660: etaccāyuktam yasmād ekavibhaktinirdeśe kriyamāṇe cakāreṇa tulyabalatvaṃ na pradarśitaṃ syāditi // 3 //
SA15dhnyabpu:664: anena lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyākhyānaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandharūpaṃ pratyuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:667: yadayapyanvarthasaṃjñayā kalpanāpoḍhaṃ yadbhrāntaṃ ca tatpratyakṣamiti śakyate yathārtha kathayitum,
SA15dhnyabpu:668: tathāpi na svarūpaṃ pratyakṣasya kathitaṃ syat,
SA15dhnyabpu:669: yato 'nyadapi pratyakṣasya svarūpamartha avayavārthastu- kalpanābhya apoḍhamiti kalpanāpoḍham /
SA15dhnyabpu:675: kasmād viśeṣaṇadvayamuktamiti ced? ucyate, timiravato bhrāntajñānavyaccedārtham abhrāntamityuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:679: yat tad bhavatām asmākaṃ cārtheṣu sākṣātkāri jñāni prasiddham,
SA15dhnyabpu:682: kimanyat pratyakṣasya jñānasya rūpamavaśiṣyate yat pratyakṣaśabdavācyaṃ sad anūdyeteti,
SA15dhnyabpu:683: yasmādindriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyyartheṣu sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ pratyakṣaśabda vācyaṃ sarveṣāṃ prasiddham,
SA15dhnyabpu:686: lakṣyalakṣaṇetukathite yathārtha kathitaṃ bhavati yat kiñcit pratyakṣaṃ tat kalpanāpoḍhābhrāntamiti pratipattavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:687: ata eva lakṣaṇakaraṇaṃ saṃjñākaraṇaṃ bhavati, saṃjñākaraṇatvenāpratītelakṣaṇakaraṇasya /
SA15dhnyabpu:689: na cānityatvaṃ saṃjñeti gamyata iti saṃjñā lakṣaṇakaraṇayorbhedaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:691: tenāpyatra lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvo viparītamākhyātaṃ bhaṅgayāḥ yato lakṣaṇavidhānakāle lakṣyamanūdaya lakṣaṇavidhīyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:693: siddhe tu lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāve sati lakṣaṇasanūdaya lakṣyaṃ vidhīyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:694: aythā- yaḥ śikhāvān sa parivrājakaḥ iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:696: viparītavidhānamityanyadapi asminmate dūṣaṇaṃ dattvaṃ viniścayaṭīkāyā ṭīkākṛtteti tatraiva draṣṭavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:697: nanu ca lakṣaṇavidhipakṣe pratyakṣasyādyāpyasiddhatvādanūdyaṃ na sambhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:699: aythā- śikhayā parivrājakaḥ ityatra śikhālakṣaṇamanūdya kalpanāpoḍhādi vidhīyate?
SA15dhnyabpu:701: evaṃ manyate- yadyapi kalpanāpoḍhatvena pratyakṣaṃ na siddham,
SA15dhnyabpu:704: nanu ca tayoraprasiddhatvāt pratyakṣasyāprasiddhireva, pratyasya tatsvabhāvatvāt?
SA15dhnyabpu:708: yogācārā hi sarvamālambanajñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ kalpanāyāḥ apoḍham apeta kalpanāpoḍham /
SA15dhnyabpu:715: tatrāsati abhrāntagrahaṇe gaccadvṛkṣadarśanādi pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhatvāt syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:716: tato hi pravṛttena vṛkṣamātramavāpyate iti saṃvādakatvāt samyagjñānam,
SA15dhnyabpu:722: abhrāntamarthakriyākṣame ca vasturūpa ityādināvisaṃvādo 'rtho 'bhrāntaśabdasya na sambhavatīti darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:724: sanniveśopādhivarṇātmakamityanenaitad darśayati- varṇādanyat saṃsyānādikaṃ paraparikalpitaṃ nāstīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:725: etacca lakṣaṇadvayamityādinā padadvayena vipratipattinirāsaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyakhyā padadvayavyavacedakathanarūpā dūṣitā /
SA15dhnyabpu:726: tena tvevaṃ vyākhyātam- abhrāntamiti yad visaṃvādi na bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:727: evaṃ satyanumāsyāpi pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇaṃ tannivṛttyartham /
SA15dhnyabpu:729: ālambane yanna bhrāntaṃ tadabhrāntam ityevamucyamāne sarva pratyakṣaṃ jñānamālambane bhrāntamiti na kasyacit pratyakṣatvaṃ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:730: tathā cāha- sarvamālambane bhrāntaṃ muktvā tathāgatajñānam,
SA15dhnyabpu:735: nanu ca bhavataḥ pakṣe 'pi kimiti vyavaccedārtha na bhavati? ityāha- etaccetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:737: api tvarthakriyākṣame vasturūpa ālamabane yanna bhrāmyati tadabhrāntaśabdena gṛhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:740: yogācāramatena tvabhrāntagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyamḥ saṃvādakasya samyagjñānasya prastutatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:751: yadi mithyājñānam, kathaṃ tato vṛkṣāvāptiḥ? iti cet, na tato vṛkṣāvāptiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:754: tato yaddeśo gaccad vṛkṣo dṛṣṭaḥ taddeśo nāvāpyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:755: yaddeśaścāvāpyate sa na dṛṣṭa iti tasmāt kaścidartho 'vāpyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:759: tathā hi momāṃsakādaya evamāhuḥ yathā nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ tathā jātyādiyojanājñānamapi samyagjñānamindriyajamḥ upadarśitasyārthasya prāpaṇāt / tathā cāha-
SA15dhnyabpu:764: na prakāśaḥ prakāśena sā hi pratyavamaśinī //
SA15dhnyabpu:765: na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamadṛte /
SA15dhnyabpu:767: tathā naiyāyikādīnāṃ savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣamiti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇena nirākriyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:768: tathā kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇena nirvikalpe siddhe 'grahaṇamatiricyamāna dvicandrajñānādeḥsamyagjñānādhikaraṇa eva nirastatvād vipratipattinirāsārthatvameva bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:770: gaccadvṛkṣadarśanajñānaṃ cālātacakrajñānamabhrāntamapi samyagjñānamiccantiḥ vastuno 'bhrāntatvāt pītākārādeśca bhrāntatvāda- ityasti vipratipatti,
SA15dhnyabpu:772: tathā sati abhrāntagrahaṇa ityādinābhrāntaviṣayasya vipratipattiviṣayaṃ darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:783: abhilapyate 'neneti abhilāpaḥ=vācyaḥ tathā abhrāntagrahaṇenāpyanumāne nivartite kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇaṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇārtham /
SA15dhnyabpu:785: pratyakṣaṃ tu grāhya rūpe na viparyastam /
SA15dhnyabpu:786: na tvavisaṃvādakamabhrāntimiha grahītavyam yataḥ samyagjñānameva pratyakṣam, nānyat /
SA15dhnyabpu:788: evaṃ hi vākyārthaḥ syāt- pratyakṣākhyaṃ yadavisaṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ tat kalpanāpoḍhamavisaṃvādakaṃ ceti /
SA15dhnyabpu:790: tasmād grāhya'rthakriyākṣame vasturūpe yadaviparyastaṃ tadabhrāntamiha veditavyam / // 4 //
SA15dhnyabpu:791: kīdṛśī panaḥ kalpaneha gṛhyate? ityāha- abhilāpetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:793: abhilāpena saṃsargaḥ abhilāpasaṃsargaḥ= ekasmin jñāne 'bhidheyākārasyābhidhānākāreṇa saha ghrāhyākāratayā milanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:794: tato yadaikasmin jñāne 'bhidheyābhidhānayorākārau sanniviṣṭau bhavataḥ tadā tathā bhrāntagrahaṇenetyādinā kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇadya vipratipattinirāsārthatvaṃ darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:797: tasyārthasma grahaṇe doṣaṃ darśayati- na tvavisaṃvādakamityādinā // 4 //
SA15dhnyabpu:798: kīdṛśī punaḥ kalpanetyādinā kalpanābahutvāt kasyāḥ kalpanāyā grahaṇamiti kalpanāviśeṣamajānan pṛccati /
SA15dhnyabpu:799: tathā hi- vaibhāṣikā indriyavijñānaṃ vitarka vicāra caitasikasamprayuktaṃ kalpanāmiccanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:800: yogācāramatena ca tathāgatajñānamadvayaṃ muktvā sarvajñānaṃ grahyagrāhakatvena vikalpitaṃ kalpanā /
SA15dhnyabpu:802: abhilāpetyādinā śabdasaṃsṛṣṭasya vikalpasya grahaṇaṃ nāgamaparipaṭhitānāmiti darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:810: tadeva hi anvayavyatirekavattvād vyāptatvād abhilāpayituṃ śakyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:812: abhilāpasaṃsargasya yogyo 'bhidheyākārābhāso yasyāṃ pratītau sā tathoktā /
SA15dhnyabpu:814: yathā- vyutpanna saṃketasya ghaṭārthakalpanā ghaṭaśabdasaṃsṛṣṭārthāvabhāsā bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:815: kācittu abhilāpenāsaṃsṛṣṭāpi abhilāpasaṃsargayogyābhāsā bhavatiḥ yathā- bālakasyāvyutpannasaṃketasya kalpanā /
SA15dhnyabpu:816: tatra abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāsā kalpanā ityuktāvavyutpannasaṃketasya kalpanā na saṃgṛhyeta /
SA15dhnyabpu:818: yadayapi abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāsā na bhavati tadaharjātasya bālakasya kalpanā,
SA15dhnyabpu:822: sāmānyadi tena vinītadevavyākhyā dūṣitā- abhilapyata ityabhilāpaḥ= vācyaḥ sāmānyādiḥ ityevaṃrūpā /
SA15dhnyabpu:823: evamevātrāśrayaṇīyam, anyathā yogyagrahaṇena śabdasaṃsargayogyo na kathitaḥ syāditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:824: yadayevam, dharmottaravyākhyāne jātyādervācakasya saṃsargabhāvo na pradarśitaḥ syāt?
SA15dhnyabpu:826: viṣayacintāyāṃ sāmānyādeviṣayabhāvakathanena sāmarthyāt kathitaṃ bhavatīti nirodhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:828: nanu ca yadayapi tasmin jñāne ākārayormīlanaṃ tathapi śabdārthayoḥ saṃsargo nāsti?
SA15dhnyabpu:831: tatra kācit pratītirityādinā yogyagrahaṇasya viṣayaṃ darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:833: nanu cāvyutpannasaṃketasya bālamūkāderanumato vijñāne na śabdasaṃsarga iti tadayogyatvamapi nāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:835: mūkādijñāne tu saṃketābhāve sati śabdaratibhāso 'pi na sambhavatīti sasargayogyatvamapi nāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:844: yadvā- na abhilapyate iti abhilāpaḥ= abhidherya yadarthasāmānyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:850: jñāne 'bhilāpasaṃsargayogyo yaḥ pratibhāsaḥ sa evābhilāpa asatyabhilāpasaṃsarge kuto yogyatāvasitiḥ?
SA15dhnyabpu:853: grahyo hyartho vijñānaṃ janayan niyatapratibhāsaṃ kuryāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:854: yathā rūpaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ janayanniyatapratibhāsaṃ janayati, vikalpavijñānaṃ tvarthānnotpadayate /
SA15dhnyabpu:857: bālo 'pi hi yāvad dṛśyamānaṃ stanaṃ sa evāyam iti pūrvaduṣṭatvena na pratyavamṛśati tāvannoparatarudito mukhamarpayati stane /
SA15dhnyabpu:862: tataśca vyāavarttyābhavāda yogyagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyamityāśaṅkāṃ parasya darśayati asatyabhilāpetyādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:868: nanu kalpanājñānamapyarthādutpadayamānaṃ niyatākāarṃ bhaviṣyati? ityāha- vikalpavijñānamityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:871: tathā niyatapratibhāsaṃ vikalpajñānaṃ bālamūkāderapyastīti darśayati- bālo 'pi hītyādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:872: nanu ca bālasya tālvādikaraṇapāṭavābhāve sāmānyaviśeṣaśabdoccāraṇaṃ nāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:874: satyaṃ nāstiḥ kintu sa evāyam ityenena vikalpasyāvasthocyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:877: etad darśayati- bālasyāpi pūrvaparaparāmarśarūpaṃ vikalpakaṃ vijñānamasti,
SA15dhnyabpu:882: evaṃ śleṣeṇa vākyasya vyākhyānena ubhayorapi tadvikalpākāraḥ abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsa ityuktaṃ veditavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:887: yadayapi hi svalakṣaṇameva vācyaṃ vācakaṃ ca bhavet,
SA15dhnyabpu:889: na cendriyavijñānam arthena niyamitapratibhāsatvāt abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ bhavatīti nirvikalpakam /
SA15dhnyabpu:891: śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ ca kiñcit vācyaṃ kiñcid vācakam- ityabhilākasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:893: ropitatvāditi saṃsagaṃyogyaṃ bālamūkādervijñānamiti tannivṛttyarthaṃ yogyagrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti sthitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:894: indriyavijñānamityādinā kumarilena yadindriyavijñānasyālocanākhyasya bālamūkādivijñānena sādṛśyaṃ pratipāditam,
SA15dhnyabpu:895: tad dūṣayitumukasṃhāravyājena vailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayati ata evetvādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:897: ata eva svalakṣaṇasyāpi śabdasyārthasya ca vācya vācakatvamamyupagamya nirvikalpakatvamindriyavijñānasya sādhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:898: vikalpavijñānasya tu svalakṣaṇavācya vācakatvaṃ pratibhāsino 'pi savikalpakatvamiti sthitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:902: kutaḥ? sāmānyayorviṣayacintāyāmeva nirasyamānatvāditi nirvikalpakatvakathanaṃ vyartha syādiha /
SA15dhnyabpu:904: tena yad vinītadevena sāmānyayorvācyavācakabhāvamaṅgīkṛtya nirvikalpakatvamindriyāvijñānasya pratipāditam,
SA15dhnyabpu:911: tadā kiñcid vācyaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ kiñcid vācakaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇa
SA15dhnyabpu:916: tena etaduktyā śabdārthasāmānyākārarahitāyā pratītiḥ sā eva pratītiḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:923: satyapi svalakṣaṇasya vācyavācakabhāve saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvena gṛhyamāṇaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ vācyaṃ vācakaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:924: na ca saṃketakālabhāvi darśanaviṣayatvaṃ vastunaḥ saṃpratyamti /
SA15dhnyabpu:925: yathā hi- saṃketakālabhāvi darśanamadya niruddham, tadvat tadviṣayatvamapi arthasyādya nāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:929: tayā kalpanayā kalpanāsvabhāvena rahitaṃ śūnyaṃ sahjñānaṃ yadabhrāntaṃ tat pratyakṣam iti pareṇa sambandhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:931: tataḥ śuddhayoḥ śravaṇe sati śabdavijñāne dvayorapi śabdayoḥ pratibhāsanāccotrendriyajñānamaniyatapratibhāsitvāt savikalpakaṃ syādityākūtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:934: tathāpi śrotravijñāne na vācyavācakatayā tayoḥ pratibhāsanam,
SA15dhnyabpu:939: tāvat kuto vācyatvaṃ vācakatvaṃ vā syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:940: etatpratyabhijñayā sa evāyaṃ vācako bhaviṣyatotyāha na ca saṃketakāletyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:942: kaśca saṃketaviṣayaḥ śabdaḥ? yaḥ saṃketakālabhāvinā jñānena viṣayīkṛtaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:943: yaśca pūrva jñānena viṣayīkṛtaḥ sa idānī nāsti, pūrvajñānavināśe pūrvajñānaviṣayatvasyābhāvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:945: yogijñānena yadyekasmin kāle manovijñānena ca yugapaccabdāthau gṛhyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:946: tathāpi sannihitavastutayā tena gṛhītavyāviti darśayati- yogijñānamityādinā // /5 //
SA15dhnyabpu:947: nanu kalpanājñānamapi parayā kalpanayā śūnyam, tataśca tasyāpi nirvikalpakatvaṃ prāpnoti?
SA15dhnyabpu:950: timiraṃ ca āśubhramaṇaṃ ca nauyānaṃ ca saṃkṣobhaśceti te ādayo yeṣāṃ te timirāśubhramaṇanauyānasaṃkṣobhādayaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:952: āhito vibhrabho yasmiṃmastad āhitavibhramam, na āhitavibhramamityanāhitavibhramam /
SA15dhnyabpu:958: na pratyekam- iti darśayituṃ tayā rahitaṃ yadabhrāntaṃ tat pratyakṣamiti lakṣaṇayoḥ parasparasāpekṣayoḥ pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ darśitamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:966: gaccantyāṃ nāvi sthitasya gaccadvṛkṣādibhrāntirutpadyate iti yaunagrahaṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:971: sarvareva ca vibhramakāraṇairindriyaviṣayabāhyādhyātmikāśrayagatairindriya- manyate-dharmiṇā kalpanājñānena dharmo 'tra kalpanātvaṃ lakṣyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:972: yathā viṣāṇītyava viṣāṇitvamḥ tataśca kalpanātvena rahitaṃ yajjñānaṃ tannirvikalpakam /
SA15dhnyabpu:975: na svātantryeṇa pṛthaglakṣaṇatvamiti darśayitumante pratyakṣaśabdaṃ gṛhītvā tayorapi sambadhnāti-tatpratyakṣamiti pareṇa sambandha ityanena /
SA15dhnyabpu:986: bāhyā nauḥ saivāśrayastatra sthitasyāśrayadvārako vibhrama uccate /
SA15dhnyabpu:988: nanu cendriyagatameva vibhramakāraṇam pratyucyateḥ nānyairindriyagatairindriyaṃ bikriyāṃ gatam?
SA15dhnyabpu:996: kathaṃ tallamyate iti ced? kalpanā jñānenaiva pratibaddhā, bhrāntirapi jñānadharma iti dṛṣṭam /
SA15dhnyabpu:998: yathā avatsā gaurānīyatām ityanena kācit aśvā nānīyate ghenurevā noyate tasyā eva vatsambandhadarśanāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1006: pravibhāgo 'yaṃ viprati- meva vikartavyam avikṛte indriye indriyabhrāntyayogāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1007: ete sṃkṣobhaparyantā ādayo yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1008: ādigrahaṇena kācakāmalādaya indriyasthā gṛhyante, āśunayanānayanādayo viṣayasthāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1010: hastiyānādayo bāhyāśrayasthāḥ, gāḍhamarmaprahārādaya ādhyātmikāśrayasthā vhibhramahetavo gṛhyante /
SA15dhnyabpu:1011: tairanāhito vibhrabho yasmistat tathāvidhaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam // 6 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1012: tadevaṃ lakṣaṇamākhyāya yairindrayameva draṣṭa kalpiatm, mānasapratyakṣariti darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1013: viniścaro tu saṃkṣobhaśabdena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaṃ kṛtvādiśabdena bahubrīhisamāsaṃ darśayataḥ ko 'bhirpāyaṣṭhīkākṛta iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1015: yadā saṃkṣobhaśabdena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsastadāśrayagatasya vibhramakāraṇasya upalakṣaṇatvād vātapittādergrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti nārthabhedaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1019: ucyateḥ, asatyāśubhramaṇādigrahaṇe indriyagatamevādiśabdena kācakāmalādi gṛhyata ityāśaṃkyeta /
SA15dhnyabpu:1025: tata ubhayopādāne sati timirādīmybhayakātsnrya labhyata iti sthitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1026: tat tathāvidhaṃ jñānamiti yadayapi sūtre jñānagrahaṇaṃ nāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:1027: tathāpi bhrānte jñānadharmatvād tadvayudāsena jñānameva pratyakṣaṃ gṛhyata ityadoṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1028: vinītadevavyākhyāyāṃ bhavati tu pratykṣasūtresyārthakathanaṃ jñānaṃ pratykṣamiti,
SA15dhnyabpu:1031: vaibhāṣikaiḥ- cakṣuḥ paśyati rūpāṇi iti atiriṣyate/
SA15dhnyabpu:1032: mānase ca pratyakṣe doṣa udbhāvita iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1035: rūpaṃ dṛśyate cakṣurvijñānena tadākṛṣṭena manovijñānena iti,
SA15dhnyabpu:1039: keṣāñcit indriyameva darhsakartuṃ iṣṭam, tannirāsārtha prathamam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1040: indriyajanyaṃ jñānṃ hi pratyakṣam, na tvindriyamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1041: kaiścit mānasapratyakṣe doṣa udbhāvitaḥ, taddopaparihāratha dvitīyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1043: kecid yogipratyakṣaṃ nānumanyante, tannirāsārtha caturtha pratyakṣamuktam // 7 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1046: manastu indriyaṃ naḥ mānasapratyakṣasya pṛthaṅ nirdeśāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1047: tasmāt cakṣurādīndriyeṣu āśritaṃ jñānameva indriyajanya pratyakṣam // 8 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1051: teṣāṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇārtha pratyakṣasya prakārabhedaṃ darśayannāha- taccaturvidhamiti // 7 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1057: tanmanojñānaṃ yadīndriyavijñānaviṣaye pravatate tadā gṛhītagrāhitayā pramāṇam athānyaviṣaya pravartate,
SA15dhnyabpu:1058: vyavahite pratyakṣaṃ bhavat ki tanmanovijñānamindriyasavyapekṣaṃ syāt?
SA15dhnyabpu:1061: nirapekṣatve vānindrisyāpi manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syādityandhavadhirādyabhāvacodayaṃ kṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1067: mīmāṃsakādaya evamāhuḥ- yogina eva na santi samprati pramāṇābhāvāt, ki punasteṣāṃ jñānamiti // 7 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1072: indriyāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ pratyakṣam iti bruvatā vārttikakṛtā na cakṣuḥ pramāṇam iti kathitaṃ bhavati yasmājjñānasyaivānvayavyatirekānuvidhānād rūpādidarśane sāmarthyam, na cakṣuṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1073: yattūktam- jñānaṃ cet paśyati, vyavahitamapi ki na paśyati?
SA15dhnyabpu:1084: sa sahakāriī yasya indriyajñānasya taqt svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāri indriyajñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1085: samanantarapratyayabhūtena indriyajñānena janitaṃ yat tadeva manomātrāśrayatvānmānasaṃ pratyakṣamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1086: mānasapratyakṣe parairyodoṣa udbhāvitaḥ, taṃ nirākartu mānasapratykṣalakṣaṇamāha- svaviṣayetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:1087: sva ātmīyo viṣaya indriyajñānasya tasya anantaraḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1090: tataścāntare pratiṣiddhe samānajātīyo dvitīyakṣaṇabhavyupadeyakṣaṇa indriyavijñānaviṣayasya gṛhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1094: iha ca kṣaṇike vastuni atiśayādhānāyogādekakāyakāritvena sahakārī gṛhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1095: viṣayaviānābhyāṃ hi manovijñānamekaṃ kriyate yataḥ, tadanayoḥ paraspara sahakaritvam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1098: tasyanantara ityasya vivaraṇam- na vidayata ityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:1104: nanu ca kathaṃ viṣayakṣaṇasya sahakāritvam, ekasmin kṣaṇe upakāryopakārakabhavābhāvāt?
SA15dhnyabpu:1106: evaṃ manyate- nātropakāraktvāt sahakāritvam, api tu ekakāryakāritvāditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:1111: yadā yogijñānaṃ parasyairvavidhajñānamālambate, tadālambanabhūtena yogijñānaṃ janyata iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1114: smantara iti ca bhavati śakan'vādiṣu pāṭhāt ṣararūpatvam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1115: yataḥ sa ceti iha svaviṣayānantaraviṣaya it kathanaṃ gṛhītagrahaṇādavabodhakaṃ na bhavatīti doṣam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1123: sa cāsau pratyayaśca hetutvāt samanantarapratyayaḥ, tena janitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1124: tadanenaikasantānāntarbhūtayoreva indriyajñāna manovijñānayojanyajanakabhāve manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti uktaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1131: tena janitamityādinetat kathayati- indriyavijñānena svaviṣayāntaraviṣayasahakāriṇopādānabhūtena yajjanitaṃ tadeva manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1133: yadā cetyādinā dvayorekaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛhītvā yaccoditaṃ pareṇa tat parihṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1134: pūrvakṣaṇe indriyavijñānasya viṣayo dvitīyakṣaṇe manovijñānasya viṣaya ityagṛhītagrāhi manovijñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1135: yadā cityādinā yaccodayaṃ kṛtam- yadi manovijñānamindriyasavyapekṣam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1138: vyavahitasya nīlādergrahaṇai bhavatu iti, tat parihṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1142: tena teṣāṃ na manovijñānaṃ bhavatīti parihṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1147: anyathā pañca bāhyā vijñeyāḥ ityasya vyaghātaḥ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1149: nopādeyakṣaṇa evaḥ tena vijñānaviṣayadeśe 'paraśbdo yadotpadyate tadā mānasaṃ pratykṣaṃ svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā janitaṃ bhavatītyadoṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1152: indriyavijñānena samanantarapratyayena janitamityukterandhavadhirādayabhavayadā cidnriyavijñānaviṣayopādeyabhūtaḥ kṣaṇo gṛhītaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:1155: cyapāravati tu cakṣuṣi yad rūpajñānaṃ tat sarva cakṣuraśritamevaḥ itarathā cakṣurāśritatvānu papattiḥ kasyacidapi vijñānasya /
SA15dhnyabpu:1156: etacca siddhāntaprasiddhaṃ mānasaṃ pratyakṣam, na tvasya prasādhakamasti pramāṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1157: evañjātīyakaṃ tad yadi syāt na kaścid doṣaḥ syād- iti vaktuṃ lakṣaṇamākhyātamasyeti // 9 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1160: yadā cakṣuviṣayamālocyoparataṃ bhavati tadālocanāviṣaye cakṣurvijñānamutpannaṃ sat punadvitīye kṣaṇa ātmīyaviṣayānantaraviṣaye notpadayateḥ indriyāṇāṃ tatra vyāpārābhāvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1161: tataśca tenendriyavijñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā pratyakṣamutpadayate iti sthitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1162: nanvekasmin kṣaṇe tasyotpadake sati na tatra kācidarthakriyāvāpyate- iti puruṣārthānupayogitvāt prāmāṇyaṃ prāpnoti?
SA15dhnyabpu:1163: ucyateḥ na mānasapratyakṣeṇāsmadvighānāmarthakriyāvāptirbhavati, api tu yogino vītarāgādeḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1164: te ca tasmin kṣaṇe mānase copadarśitaṃ viṣayaṃ pratipadaya dharmadeśanādikamarthakriyāmāsādayantītyanavadayam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1165: atha vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi kimiti mānasotpattilupyate? ityāha- vyāpāravatītyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:1167: nanu vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi prathame kṣaṇa indriyavijñānaṃ bhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:1171: evaṃ manyate- vyāāravati cakṣuṣi kimitīndriyavijñānaṃ notpadayate,
SA15dhnyabpu:1174: nanu ca yadi mānasaṃ pratyakṣamindriyavijñānād bhitre pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhaṃ bhavet,
SA15dhnyabpu:1175: tadā tasya lakṣaṇaṃ yāvatā pramāṇasiddhameva nāsti?
SA15dhnyabpu:1179: tadetad dharmottareṇāgamasiddhaṃ darśayatāmācāryajñānagarbhaprabhṛtīnāṃ mānasasiddhaye yat pramāṇamupanyastam vikalpodayāt iti,
SA15dhnyabpu:1181: terevaṃ vyakhyātam- vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi indriyajñānamtpadayate, mānasaṃ ca, na śakyate
SA15dhnyabpu:1193: sarve ca te cittcaittāśca sarvacitta vaktum- dvayoyugapadutpattirnāstītiḥ yataḥ samānendriyayornāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:1197: na ca tatra bhedenānupalabhyamānaṃ mānasa nāstīti śakyate vaktumḥ samānajātīyanīlavikalpīdayāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1198: yadi ca tanna mānasaṃ syāt, tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī nīlavikalpo na syādeva /
SA15dhnyabpu:1200: yathā- devadattena nīle gṛhīte na yajñadattasya nīlaniścayo bhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:1207: tenendriyavijñānādeva vijātīyād vikalpakasyotpattenaṃ dikalpasyodayāditi mānasasiddhau hetuḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1211: avaśyaṃ cāṅgīkartavyā vikalpasyotpattiḥ, yena vārttikakāra evamāha-
SA15dhnyabpu:1215: tataśca tatsāmarthyabhavi kathaṃ vikalpavijñānaṃ smaraṇam? vijātīyatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1216: na ca tatra mānasaṃ saṃviducyate indriyavijñānasya vyavahāreṇa,
SA15dhnyabpu:1217: prāmāṇyasya cintyatvāt kiñca indriyavijñānasya kathaṃ prāmānyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1221: nanu cittacaitā iti vaktavye sarvagrahaṇasya vyāvartyābhāvādapārthakaṃ tadgrahaṇam?
SA15dhnyabpu:1224: sarve hi cittacaittāḥ pratītisvabhāvatvāt svarūpajñāpakā bhavanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1225: yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśasvabhāvatvād ātmano 'pi prakāśako bhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:1229: nāsti sā kācit cittāvasthā, yasyāmātmanaḥ saṃvedanaṃ na pratyakṣaṃ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1230: yena hi rūpeṇātmā vedayate tadrūpamātmasavedanaṃ pratyakṣam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1231: iha ca rūpādau vastuni dṛśyamāne āntaraḥ sukhādayākārastulyakālaṃ saṃvedayate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1232: na ca gṛhayamāṇākāro nīlādiḥ sātarūpo vedayate- iti vaktuṃ śakyamḥ yato nīlādiḥ sātarūpeṇānubhūyate iti ca niścīyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1233: yadi hi sātarūpo 'yaṃ nīlādiranubhūyate iti niścīyeta, syāt tadā tasya sātādirupatvam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1234: yasmin rūpe pratyakṣasya sākṣātkāritvavyāpāro vikalpenānugamyate tat pratykṣam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1236: na kevalaṃ prasiddhāḥ sukhaḥ dayaścittarcattāḥ svasaṃvedanā gṛhyanteḥ anye 'pi svasaṃvedanā iti tātparyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1239: evaṃ brubatā ṭīkākṛtānena nirodhasamāpattyasthāyāṃ śuddhacittābhāva evetyabhiprāyaḥ pradarśitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1240: tasyāmavasthāyāṃ na kācit cittāvasthā saṃvedayate yataḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1241: nanu cittacaittānāmātmasaṃvedarna nāsti, svātmani kāritvavirodhādityuktam? ityāha- yena hītyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:1243: evaṃ manyate- yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśatayā svarūpaṃ nivedayannātmaprakāśane na pradīpāntamapekṣate,
SA15dhnyabpu:1244: tathā cittādikamapi saṃvidrūpatayā svarūpaṃ nivedayadātmasaṃvedane na jñānāntaramapekṣate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1245: na ca svātmani kāritvavirodhaḥ, yato vāstavakārakatvābhāvaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1247: tatrāpi nīlākārotpattireva prakāśakatvaṃ jñānasya pradīpasyāpi prāgbhāvitvameva /
SA15dhnyabpu:1250: tataśca vijñānaṃ bodharūpatayā pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ kathamapahnuyate bhavatā parokṣaṃ vijñānamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1251: evaṃ tāvat mausāṃsakādīn prati vijñānaṃ saṃvedanapratyakṣanirdiṣṭam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1252: yastu sāṃkhyo 'pi bāhyārūpāḥ sukhādayaḥ iti manyate, taṃ pratyāha- iha ca
SA15dhnyabpu:1254: tathā cittacaitā api svarūpāvabodhe jñānāntaraṃ nāpekṣante /
SA15dhnyabpu:1260: bhāvanā iti na ca nīlasya sātarūpatvamanugamyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1264: tacca jñānarūpadevadanamātmanaḥ sākṣātkāri nirvikalpakam, abhrāntaṃ ca /
SA15dhnyabpu:1275: evaṃ manyate- nīlarūpāt sātādikamantaraṃ saṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ na bāhayenābhinnarūpaṃ jaḍarūpaṃ ca śakyate vktumiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1276: amumvārtha na ca gṛhyamāṇākāra ityādinā darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1277: sākṣātkāritvavyāpāra iti / pratyakṣasya vyāpāraḥ / vikalpaḥ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī /
SA15dhnyabpu:1280: tena nīlādiḥ sātasvabhāvo na pratyakṣasiddhaḥ iti sāṅkhayaṃ nirākurvatā grāhyāgrāhakaṃ sātādirūpaṃ bhinnaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pradarśitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1281: tena yuktamuktaṃ kaiścit- grāhayād bhinnaṃ grāhakaṃ na pratyakṣeṇānubhūyate iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1292: tataśca kṣaṇikatvādigrāhi manovijñānaṃ bhāvyamānamīṣadasampūrṇamantakṣaṇaḥ prakarṣaparyanta ucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1299: yogaḥ= samādhiḥ, sa yeṣāmasti te yoginaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1301: tathā hi samādhivalaprabhavaṃ bhūta-bhāvi-vartamānānāṃ yathāyartha prakāśakaṃ jyotiḥ avibhramamāvirbhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1302: yathā devādyaṣṭhānaprabhāveṇa satyāni svapnajñānāni bhūta-bhāvi- sampūrṇa tu yadā,
SA15dhnyabpu:1304: tataḥ sampūrṇāvasthāyāḥ prāktanī avasthā sphuṭābhatvaprakarṣaparyanta ucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1305: tasmāt paryantāt yajjātaṃ bhāvyamānasyāthasya sannihitasyeva sphuṭatarākāragrāhi jñānaṃ yoginaḥ pratyakṣam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1307: abhrakavyavahitamiva yadā bhāvyāmānaṃ vastu paśyati sā prakarṣaparyantāvasthā /
SA15dhnyabpu:1308: karatalāmalakavat bhāvyamānasyārthasya yad darśana tad yoginaḥ pratyakṣam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1311: tadiha sphuṭābhatvārambhetyādinā upasaṃhāracyajena yogino manovijñānasyāvasthātrayaṃ darśayati- bhāvanāprakarṣāvasthaikā,
SA15dhnyabpu:1316: iti nyāyād yadayapi manovijñānena bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantena śabdārtho yugapada gṛhyate tathāpi dvayoḥ svarūpasya sannihitatayā gṛhyamāṇatvāt tadgrāhi vijñānaṃ nirvikalpakamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1317: nanu ca manovijñānaṃ bhāvyamānaṃ vācyavācakasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ pratibhāsate yathā,
SA15dhnyabpu:1318: tathaiva bhāvyamānaṃ prakarṣaparyantarja manovijñānaṃ vācyavācakapratirbhāsi sphuṭābhaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1321: eva manyate- aydyapi manovijñānaṃ vācya vācakasaṃsṛṣṭipratibhāsi,
SA15dhnyabpu:1324: atastadeva cidrūpaṃ jñānaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavati, na vācya vācakākāratayāḥ tayorārapitarūpatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1325: āropitarūpagrahaṇasphuṭatvameva na syāditi nānekāntikatvaṃ hetoḥ, sphuṭābhatvādityasya /
SA15dhnyabpu:1329: tathaiva yogabalena dhyeyānāṃ jñānamatītānāgata dūra sāntara aṇubhūtaviṣayāṇā prakāśakaṃ jyotīrūpamutpadyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1331: atra prayogaḥ- yogīśvarāṇāmekāgracittānāṃ jñānaṃ bhūta bhāvi vastuviṣayakaṃ pramāṇam ameyabhūta bhāvivastujātasya abhrāntopadarśanahetutvād,
SA15dhnyabpu:1333: yanna prāmāṇikaṃ tanna ameyabhūtabhāvi vastujātasyābhrāntopadarśanahetu, yathāunmattajñānam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1334: aprāpakasyāpi ameya bhūta bhāvivastujātasya abhrāntopadarśanahetave 'yogyamapakārakamapi pramāṇaṃ ṣyāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1335: dambhamātreṇāmeyasya padārthasya abhrāntopadarśanaṃ hi na sambhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1336: tasya vyākhyānam- yathā grahaviśeṣāveśe bhūta bhāvivastusamūhānuśāsanam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1339: yathā vā bhagavata śākyamunerupadeśe bhāvideśanimitta satyopalabdhi mātṛceṭa kālakṣaya rājāśokādi āśāvana kaśmīrādeśāgamā aviparītā upalabhyante // 11 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1341: vikalpavijñānaṃ hi saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvena vastu gṛhṇat śabdasaṃsargayogyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1343: yathā ca pūrvotpannaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ samprati asat,
SA15dhnyabpu:1345: tadasadrūpaṃ vastuno gṛhṇad, asannihitārthagrāhitvād asphuṭābhaṃ vikalpakam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1348: yogaḥ= samādhiḥ, sa yasyāstīti yogī, tasya jñānaṃ pratyakṣam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1353: tacca pūrvavijñānaṃ saṃprati śabdasaṃsargayogyavastugrahaṇakāle nāsti, kṣaṇikatvājjñānasya /
SA15dhnyabpu:1355: viṣayiṇo jñānasyābhāve viṣayasyāpyarthasya saṃketakālabhāvi no 'bhāva ityasannihitaṃ saṃketakālabhāvi tad vastvāropya gṛhṇad vikalpavijñānamasphuṭaṃ bhavatīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1356: sphuṭatvaṃ tato nivṛttaṃ nirvikalpe 'vattiṣṭhate iti vyāptiḥ sidhyati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1357: tataḥ sphuṭatvānnirvikalpakaṃ yogijñānamabhrāntaṃ ca pramāṇena śuddhārthagrāhitvāt saṃvādakam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1363: pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ yaduktam- tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇameva iti draṣṭavyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1366: tadevaṃ pratyakṣasya kalpanāpoḍhatvābhrāntatvayuktasya prakārabhedaṃ pratipādaya viṣayavipratipatti nirākatukāma āha- tasyetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:1367: tasya catuvidhasya pratyakṣasya viṣayo boddhavyaḥ svalakṣaṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1369: vastuno hyasādhāraṇaṃ ca tattvamasti sāmānyaṃ ca /
SA15dhnyabpu:1371: dvividho hi viṣayaḥ pramāṇasya- grāhyaśca yadākāramutpadyate, prāpaṇīyaśca yamadhyavasyati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1375: santāna eva ca pratyakṣasya prāpaṇīyaḥ, kṣaṇasya prāpayitumaśakyatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1382: iha kaiścinmīmāṃsakābidhiḥ pratyakṣasya sāmānyaviśeṣo dvāvapi viṣayakalpitau /
SA15dhnyabpu:1384: sāṅkhayena dvayorapi viśeṣo viṣaya iṣṭaḥ sāmānyasyābhāvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1386: ātmārdvatatayā sarvasyaikatvāda viśeṣe bhrāntatvāda dvayoriti vipratipattiḥ pratyakṣādiviṣaye /
SA15dhnyabpu:1393: etad darśayati asādharaṇameva tattvaṃ vastuno rūpam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1394: sādhāraṇaṃ tu tattvamāropitaṃ rūpam pūrvāparakṣaṇā nāmabhedāvyavasāyāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1395: ato vastuno rūpadvayam- asādhāraṇaṃ, sāmānyaṃ ca /
SA15dhnyabpu:1396: tatrā sādhāraṇatattvaṃ pratyakṣasya grāhaviṣaya iti darśayati- yadasādhāraṇamityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:1397: nanu kimucyate grāhyaviṣaya iti, yāvatā kimanyo viṣayo 'sti pratyakṣasya?
SA15dhnyabpu:1400: yaṃ santānarūpeṇa sthitamartha tat pṛṣṭha bhāvina vikalpena vinścinoti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1401: nanu ca kathaṃ pratyakṣasya santāno viṣayaḥ, yato vikalpasyāsau viṣayaḥ? ucyate upacārāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1402: pratyakṣavyāpāreṇa vikalpenādhyavaseyatayā viṣayīkṛtatvāt pratyakṣaviṣaya ityucyate upacārādityadoṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1405: svalakṣaṇaṃ ca kīdṛśamavagantavyamiti cet? tatrāha- yasyeti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1411: asannidhāne sa punarāropito 'rtho gṛhyamāṇaḥ svalakṣaṇetvenāvasīyate yataḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:1414: tadatra pramāṇasya grāhya viṣayaṃ darśayatā pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣaya uktaḥ // 12 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1415: kaḥ punarasau viṣayo jñānasya yaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ pratipattavyaḥ? ityāhayasyārthasyetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:1420: tasmāt sannidhānādasannidhānācca jñānapratibhāsasya grāhyakārasya bhedaḥ sphuṭatvāsphuṭatvābhyām /
SA15dhnyabpu:1428: evaṃ manyate- nanu pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayaḥ ityukte sāmānyamapi tasya viṣaya iti tadap svalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti praśnaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:1429: asannidhānaṃ dūradeśāvasthānamiti bruvatā vinītadeva sya vyākhyā dūṣitā /
SA15dhnyabpu:1430: tena hyevaivyākhyātam- sarveṇa rūpeṇa vastuno 'bhāvo 'sannidhānam iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1431: etadasaṅgatam yasmād vastunastatrābhāve jñānameva ha bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1435: na sāmānyaṃ svalakṣaṇam āropitarūpasya dūrāsannābhyāṃ sarvadavādphuṭatvāditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:1436: nanu sāmānyameva dūre gṛhyamāṇamasphuṭapratibhāsaṃ na svalakṣaṇam? ityāha- sarvāṇyevetyāhi /
SA15dhnyabpu:1439: nanu yadi dūrāsannābhyāṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ spaṣṭāspaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ rūpadvayaṃ tasya syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:1440: tataśca nikaṭasthitasya pratibhāsadvayaṃ syāt na ca niyamaḥ- dūre 'spaṣṭam, nikaṭe spaṣṭamiti?
SA15dhnyabpu:1441: ucyate na hi nolaṃ vastu spaṣṭarūpamaspaṣṭaṃ ca, apitu nīlaṃ sādhyārthakriyāsamartha
SA15dhnyabpu:1444: jñāne yo 'rthaḥ pratibhāsavailakṣaṇyaṃ karoti sa eva svalakṣaṇam // 13 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1445: astu paramārthadeva vastu pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ, kasmāt svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣaya iti cet?
SA15dhnyabpu:1453: yo hi jñānaviṣayaḥ sannihitaḥ san sphuṭābhāsaṃ jñānasya karoti,
SA15dhnyabpu:1454: asannihitastu yogyadeśastha evāsphuṭaṃ karoti, tat svalakṣaṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1455: sarvāṇyeva hi vastūni dūrāsphuṭāni dṛśyante, samīpe sphuṭāni /
SA15dhnyabpu:1461: ya evārthaḥ sannighānāsannidhānābhyāṃ sphuṭamasphuṭaṃ ca pratibhāsaṃ karoti paramārthasan sa eva /
SA15dhnyabpu:1462: sa ca pratyakṣasya viṣayo yataḥ, tasmāt tadeva svalakṣaṇam // 14 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1465: yadā dūre nīlaṃ paśyati tadālokaparamāṇūnāṃ ca rajaḥparamāṇubhirabhibhūtatvāt spaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ jñāna bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1466: nikaṭe tu ālokaparamāṇūnāṃ bahutvānna te rajaḥparamāṇubhirabhibhūtā iti spaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:1467: jñānasya spaṣṭādvāreṇārthasya spaṣṭāspaṣṭarūpe bhavataḥ, na paramārthata iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1468: sāmānyasya tu jñānadvāreṇa na spaṣṭāspaṣṭarūpe, tena na tat svalakṣaṇam // 13 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1470: tatra yadi pratyakṣasyaiva viṣayo bhavati svalakṣaṇam,
SA15dhnyabpu:1475: tadānumānasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo na viṣiddha iti svalakṣaṇaviṣayamanumānaṃ syāditi manyamānaḥ pṛcchati- kasmāt punarityādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:1478: kathaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ bhavati? ityāha- tathā hītyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:1479: yadyapi vikalpasya viṣayo vastu na bhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:1482: tadeva paramārthasaditi / evaṃ manyate- na hyāropabalādavastu vastu bhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:1485: kasmāt svalakṣaṇameva paramārthasaditi cet? tatrāha artheti /
SA15dhnyabpu:1491: arthakriyāsāmarthya lakṣaṇaṃ= svabhāvo yasya vastunastad arthakriyāsāmarthyalakṣaṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:1492: tasya bhāvaḥ arthakriyāsāmarthya lakṣaṇatvam, tasmāt arthakriyāsāmarthyalakṣaṇatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1493: evaṃ yadarthakriyāsamartha tadeva vastu iti svalakṣaṇenaivārthakriyā- ityupadarśitaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1508: tata eva hi pratyakṣaviṣayādartha kriyā prāpyate, na vikalpaviṣayāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1509: ata eva yadayapi vikalpaviṣayo dṛśya ivāvasīyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:1510: tathāpi na sa dṛśya eva tato 'rtahkriyāyā abhāvāt, dṛśyācca bhāvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1513: etasmāt svalakṣaṇāt yadanyat-svalakṣaṇaṃ yo na sarvasya śaśaviṣāṇādervastutvaprasaṅgāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1518: tadapi paramārthasaditi maḥyamānaḥ pṛccati- kasmāt punastadeva paramārthasaditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:1520: tadayamatha ityādinā samudāyasya padānāṃ tātparya darśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:1524: na ca pratibhāsavalāt tattvam asadrūpasyā pyavidayābalapratibhāsanāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:1526: tasya jñānasya vināpi sāmānyena vāsanābalāt sāmānyaiṣayotpatteriti // 15 //
SA15dhnyabpu:1527: etasmādityādinā anumānaviṣayaṃ darśayati / tathā hītyādinā pratyakṣaviṣakyeṇa
SA15dhnyabpu:1531: yasyāryasya sannidhāne 'pi ca jñānamekarūameva bhavati iti // 16 //
