SA15dhnyabpu:2342: tadayamarthaḥ- atīto 'nupalambhaḥ sphuṭaṃ smaryamāṇaḥ pramāṇaṃ vartamānaśca /
SA15dhnyabpu:2344: na tu n abhaviṣyatyatra ghaṭo 'nupalapsyamānatvādi śakyaṃ jñātum /
SA15dhnyabpu:2346: vyāpāraṃ darśayati- abhāvasya vyavahāraḥ nāsti ityevamākārakaṃ jñānam,
SA15dhnyabpu:2349: ghaṭābhāve hi jñāte niḥśaṅka gantumāgantuṃ ca pravartate /
SA15dhnyabpu:2350: tadetasya trividhasyāpi abhāvavyavahārasya dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ pravartanī sādhanī pravartikā /
SA15dhnyabpu:2351: yadyapi ca nāsti ghaṭaḥ iti jñānamanupalabdhereva bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:2353: tathāpi yasmāt pratyakṣeṇa kevalaḥ pradeśa upalabdhastasmāt iha ghaṭo nāsti ityeva ca pratyakṣavyāpāramanusaratyabhāvaniścayaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:2357: pratipatta pratyakṣa ityuktvā ca nikhilapratipatta pratyakṣaṃ nirastam /
SA15dhnyabpu:2360: anantaroktā anupalabdhirevābhāvavyavahārasādhanī ityetadeva kasmāt iti cet? āha- tasyā iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2367: kiñca- dṛśyānupalambhaniścayakaraṇasāmarthyādeva pūrvoktayā nītyā pratyakṣaṇaivābhāvo niścitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2368: kevalamadṛṣṭānāmapi sattvasambhavāt, sattvaśaṅkayā na śaknotyasattvaṃ vyavahartum /
SA15dhnyabpu:2369: ato 'nupalambho 'bhāvaṃ vyavahārayati- dṛśyo yato 'nupalabdhaḥ, tasmānnāsti iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2371: na tvakṛtaṃ karoti- ityabhāvaniścayo 'nupalambhāt pravṛtto 'pi pratyakṣeṇa kṛto 'nupalambhena pravartita ukta ityabhāvavyavahārapravartanyanupalabdhiḥ // 28 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2375: tasyā asiddhāyā nābhāvaniścayaḥ, api tvatītavartamānāyā iti // 29 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2377: sā ca eṣānupalabdhiḥ ekādaśaprakārā ekādaśa prakārā asya ityekādaśaprakārā /
SA15dhnyabpu:2380: śabdo hi sākṣāt kvacidarthāntarābhidhāyī, kvacit pratiṣedhāntarābhidhāyo/
SA15dhnyabpu:2398: dṛṣṭāntamāha- yathā nātra apratibaddhasāmarthyāni dhūmakāraṇāni santīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2408: apratibaddham= anupahataṃ dhūmajananaṃ prati sāmarthya yeṣāṃ tānyapratibaddhasāmarthyāni /
SA15dhnyabpu:2411: kāraṇāni ca nāvarśyaṃ kāryavanti bhavantīti kāryādarśanādapratibaddhasāmarthyānāmevābhāvaḥ sādhyaḥ, na tvanyeṣām /
SA15dhnyabpu:2415: tatra dhavalagṛhoparisthito gṛhāṅgaṇamapaśyannapi caturṣu pārśvaṣvaṅgaṇabhittiparyantaṃ paśyati /
SA15dhnyabpu:2416: bhittiparyantasama cālokasaṃjñakamākāśadeśe dhūmaviviktaṃ paśyatiḥ, tatra dhūmābhāvaniścayāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:2419: tadgṛhāṅgaṇadeśena ca vahninā janyamāno dhūmastaddeśaḥ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:2421: tad gṛhāṅgaṇadeśa bhittiparikṣiptaṃ bhittiparyantaparikṣiptena cālokātmanā dhūmaviviktenākāśadeśena saha dharmiṇaṃ karoti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2422: tasmād dṛśyamānādṛśaymānākāśadeśāvayavaḥ pratyakṣāpratyakṣasamudāyo vahnayabhāvapratītisāmarthyāyāto dharmī, na duśyamāna eva /
SA15dhnyabpu:2428: apratibaddhasāmarthyāni dhūmakāraṇāni na santītyanena sādhyadharma uktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2431: yadyatrāpratibaddhasāmarthyāni dhūmakāraṇāni syuḥ, tarhi dhūmo 'pyutpadyamānaḥ syādeva // 32 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2436: vṛkṣastu śiśapāyā vyāpakaḥ, tasya nivṛtau sāpi nivartitā bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:2447: na kevalamihaiva dṛśyādṛśyasamudāyo dharmī, api tu anyatrāpi /
SA15dhnyabpu:2448: śabdasya kṣaṇikatve sādhye kaścideva śabdaḥ pratyakṣaḥ, anyastu parokṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2450: yathā cātra dharmī sādhyapratipattyadhikaraṇabhūto dṛśyādṛśyāvayavo darśitaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:2452: pratiṣedhyasya vyāpyasya yo vyāpako dharmaratasyānupalabdhirudāhriyate- vyāpavetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:2460: tatra yadā pūrvāparāvupalipṭau samunnatau deśau bhavataḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:2463: draṣṭāpi tatsthān vṛkṣān paśyannapi śiśapādibhedaṃ yo na vivecayati,
SA15dhnyabpu:2466: sa hi nirvṛkṣa ekaśilāghaṭite vṛkṣābhāvaṃ dṛśyatvād dṛśyānualambhādavasyati /
SA15dhnyabpu:2474: 36 viruddhavyāptopalabdhiryathā- na dhruvabhāvo bhūtasyāpi bhāvasya vināśo hetvantarāpakṣaṇāditi //
SA15dhnyabpu:2477: tathā hi- agneḥ śītasparśena virodhāt tatsattve śītasparśo nivāryate // 34 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2486: tasmād yatra dhūmastatrāgnirapi, tatrāgnistatra ca kutaḥ śītasparśaḥ // 35 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2490: dṛṣṭāntamāha- yathā na dhruvabhāvo bhūtasyāpi bhāvasya vināśa iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2494: iyaṃ cānupalabdhistatra prayoktavyā yatra śītasparśo 'dṛśyaḥ, dṛśye dṛśyānupalabdhiprayogāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:2503: yatra śītasparśaḥ san dṛśyaḥ syāt, tatra dṛśyānupalabdhirgamikā /
SA15dhnyabpu:2506: tatra samastapavarakasthaṃ śītaṃ nivartayituṃ samarthasyāgneranumāpakaṃ yadā viśiṣṭaṃ dhūmakalāpaṃ niryāntamapavarakāt paśyati,
SA15dhnyabpu:2508: iha dṛśyamānadvārapradeśasahitaḥ sarvo 'pavarakābhyantaradeśo dharmī sādhyapratipattyanusaraṇātpūrvavad draṣṭavya iti // 35 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2509: pratiṣedhasya yad viruddhaṃ tena vyāptasya dharmāntarasya upalabdhirudāhartavyā /
SA15dhnyabpu:2515: bhūtasya jātasyāpi vinaśvaraḥ svabhāvo nāvaśyambhāvī, kimuta ajātasya iti apiśabdārdhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2516: janakād hetoranyo hetuḥ hetvantaram mudgarādi / tadapekṣate
SA15dhnyabpu:2519: bhūtasyāpi bhāvsya vināśaḥ ityanena dharmī uktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2521: tena jātasyaiva bhāvasya vināśo na nitya ityamarthaḥ paryavasitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2524: yeṣāṃ hetvantarāpekṣā, te nāvaśyambhāvinaḥ, yathā kārṣāse raktatā /
SA15dhnyabpu:2540: tathā ca sati parasparaparihāravatordvayoryadaikaṃ dṛśyate tatra dvitīyasya tādātmyaniṣedhaḥ kāryaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2542: yata evaṃ tādātmyaniṣedhaḥ kriyate- yadayayaṃ dṛśyamāno nityo bhavet,
SA15dhnyabpu:2544: na ca nityarūpo dṛśyate, tasmānna nityaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2545: evaṃ ca pratiṣedhasya nityatvasya dṛśyamānātmakatvamabhyupagamya pratiṣedahḥ kṛto bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:2548: yadayayaṃ ghaṭo dṛśyamānaḥ piśācātmā bhavet piśāco dṛṣṭo bhavet, na ca dṛṣṭaḥ, tasmānna piśāca iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2549: dṛśyātmatvābhyupagamapūrvako dṛśyamāne ghaṭādau vastuni vastuno 'vastuno vā dṛśyasyādṛśyasya ca tādātmyapratiṣedhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2550: tathā ca sati yathā ghaṭasya dṛśyatvamabhyupagamya pratiṣedho dṛśyānupalambhādeva,
SA15dhnyabpu:2551: tadvat saravsya parasparaparihāravato 'nyatra dṛśyamāne niṣedho dṛśyānupalambhadeva /
SA15dhnyabpu:2553: pratiṣedhyasya yat kārya tasya yadviruddhaṃ tasyopalabdherudāharaṇam- yatheti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2564: yatra śītasparśastatrāpratibaddhasāmarthyāni śītakāraṇāni ca kathamapi na /
SA15dhnyabpu:2565: yadi syustādṛśāni, tarhi avaśyaṃ śītasparśo 'pi syāt // 37 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2578: yatrā ca śītasparśastatra tuṣārasparśo 'pi kathamapi na // 38 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2583: tāni na santi- iti sādhyam / vahnariti hetuḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2584: yatra śītakāraṇāni adṛśyāni, śītasparśo 'pyadṛśyaḥ, tatrāyaṃ hetuḥ prayoktavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2585: dṛśyatve tu śītasparśasya tatkāraṇānāṃ vā kāryānupalabdhiḥ, dṛśyānupalabdharvā gamikā /
SA15dhnyabpu:2587: tato yasminnuddeśe sadapi śītakāraṇamadṛśyaṃ śītasparśaśca dūrasthatvāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:2588: pratipattu rvahnirbhāsvaravarṇatvād dūrādapi dṛśya tatrāyaṃ prayoga iti // 37 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2589: pratiṣedhyasya yad vyāpakaṃ tena yad viruddhaṃ tasyopalabdhirudāhatavyā yatheti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2592: yatra vyāpyastaṣārasparśo vyāpakaśca śītasparśo na dṛśyaḥ, tatrāyaṃ hetuḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2601: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇaṃ tasyānupalabdherudāharaṇam- yatheti / atreti
SA15dhnyabpu:2620: te ca romaharṣādaya eva viśeṣā iti romaharṣādiviśeṣāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2623: iha ca śītavāyupīḍitasya ye romaharṣāste eva bodhyāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2634: yatra kārya sadapi adṛśyaṃ bhavati, tatrāyaṃ prayogaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2637: niṣkampāyatasalilapūrite hnade hemantocitabāṣpodgame virale sandhyātamasi sati sannapi attra dhūmo na dṛśyata iti kāraṇānupalabdhyā pratiṣedhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:2638: vahnistu yadi tasyāmbhasaḥ upari ṣlavamāno bhavet prajvalitaḥ, rūpaviśeṣādevopalabdho bhavet /
SA15dhnyabpu:2641: ādhārarūpeṇa vā dṛśya eva vahniriti tatrāsya prayoga iti // 39 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2642: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇaṃ tasya yad viruddhaṃ tasyopalabdherudāharaṇam- yatheti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2645: sa ādiryeṣāṃ dantavīṇādīnāṃ śītakṛtānām te viśiṣyante tadanyebhyo bhayaśraddhādikṛtebhya iti romaharṣādiviśaṣāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2647: dahana eva viśiṣyate tadanyasmād dahanāccītanivartanasāmarthyaneti dahanaviśaṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2648: kaścid dahanah sannapi na śītanivartanakṣamaḥ, yathā pradīpaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2650: sannihito dahanaviśeṣo yasya sa tathoktaḥ tasya bhāvastasmāditi hetuḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2652: 41 kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalabdhiryathā- na romaharṣādiviśeṣayuktapuruṣavā yaṃ pradeśaḥ dhūmāditi //
SA15dhnyabpu:2654: tathāhi- atra romaharṣādi viśeṣasya hetuḥ śītasparśaḥ, tadviruddho 'niḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2658: kāraṇena viruddhaṃ kāraṇaviruddham, tasya kārya kāraṇaviruddhakāryam, tasyopalabdhiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2660: dṛṣṭāntamāha- yathā na romaharṣādiviśeṣayuktapuruṣavānayaṃ pradeśo dhūmāditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:2666: sa vidayate yasmin pradeśe sa roma harṣādiviśeṣayuktapuruṣavān /
SA15dhnyabpu:2667: iha romaharṣādiviśeṣasya kāraṇaṃ śītasparśaḥ / tadviruddho 'gniḥ / agnikārya dhūmaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2674: teṣāṃ kāraṇaviruddhopalabdhyābhāvaṃ pratipadyata iti tatrāsya prayoga iti // /40 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2675: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇaṃ tasya yad viruddhaṃ tasya yat kāryaṃ tasyopalabdhirudāhartavyā- yatheti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2680: tadvān na bhavatīti sādhyam / dhūmāditi hetuḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2689: dhūmastu yaduśastaddeśe sthitaṃ śītaṃ nivartayituṃ samarthasya vahnaranumāpakaḥ sa iha grāhyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2690: dhūmamātreṇa tu vahnimātre 'numite 'pi na śītasparśanivṛtiḥ, nāpi roma
SA15dhnyabpu:2691: 42 ime sarve kāryānupalabdhyādayo daśānupalabdhiprayogāḥ svabhāvānupalabdho saṃgrahanupayāntīti //
SA15dhnyabpu:2695: yatra na śītasparśastatra śītakāryāṇi romaharṣādiviśeṣāḥ kathaṃ syuḥ // 41 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2697: atha kathaṃ kāryānupalabdhyādibhiḥ svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādibhiśca pratiṣedha iti cet? tatrāha-
SA15dhnyabpu:2705: kathaṃ tarhi tasyāmantarbhava iti cet? tatrāha- arthāntaretyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:2706: harṣādiviśeṣanivṛttiravasātuṃ śakyeti na dhūmamātraṃ heturiti draṣṭavyamiti // 41 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2707: yadi ekaḥ pratiṣedhaheturuktaḥ, kathamekadaśābhāvahetavaḥ? ityāha- ime sarve ityādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:2710: tatra kiyatāmapi grahaṇe prasaktaḥ? āha- kāryānupalabdhyādaya iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2711: kāryānupalabdhyadīnāmai trayāṇāṃ caturṇā vā garahaṇe prasaktaḥ? āha- daśeti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2712: tatra daśānāmapyudāharaṇamātrāṇāṃ grahaṇaprasaṅga satyāha- sarva iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2719: nanu ca svabhāvānupalabdhiprayogād bhidyante kāryānupalbdhyādayaḥ, tat kathamantarbhavanti?
SA15dhnyabpu:2729: tathāpi paramparayā tasyā mantarbhāvo 'bhipretaḥ, na tu vastutaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2730: tathāhi kvacit kāryānupalbdhī dhūmābhāvena dhūmahetorapratibaddhasāmarthyasya abhāve siddhe abhāvapratītirbhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:2731: yatra yatra dhūmābhāvastatra tatropalabdhilakṣaṇāprāptasyaiva taddhetoranupalabdhiriti svabhāvānupalabdhāvantarbhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:2732: pratipattu ṇāṃ cintābhedād bhedaḥ- kasyacit kāryābhāvadvāreṇa hetvabhāvapratītiḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:2743: paramārthatastu na pratijñaikadeśasyāpi hetutve sati paramparārtho 'pi na ramyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2744: svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādiṣu ca vijātīyapramāṇena nivṛtyābhidhānamiti kiṃ kena samānaṃ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:2746: tatrānupalabdhiprayogaprakāraviśeṣā ekādaśa iti kuta iti cet? tasmādāha- prayogadarśanetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:2748: yadi prayogāntareṣvarthāntaravidhipratiṣedhau, kathaṃ tarhi antarbhavanti? ityāha- pāramparyeṇeti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2750: etaduktaṃ bhavati- na sākṣādete prayogā dṛśyānupalabdhimabhidadhati,
SA15dhnyabpu:2752: tataḥ praṇālikayāmīṣāṃ svabhāvānupalabdhau saṃgrahaḥ, na sākṣāditi // 43 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2764: 45 sarvatra cāsyāmabhavavyavahrasādhanyāmanupalabdhau yeṣāṃ svabhāvaviruddhādīnāmupalabdhyā kāraṇādīnāmanupalabdhyā ca pratiṣedha uktaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:2768: tasmāt prayogeṣvabhyāsātiśayāt svayamapi yadā kasyacit vyavaccedapratītirbhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:2774: kāryānupalabdhyādau tadbhāvāt kathamavyabhicāritvamiti cet? tatrāha- abhāveti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2775: abhāvavyavahārasādhanyo bahuprakārā yā anupalabdhayo 'bhihitāḥ, tāḥ sarvāstadviśetā eva draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2778: prayogābhyāsātḥ tasmāt svapratipattāvapyupayujyamānasyāsya prayogabhedasya svārthānumāne nirdeśaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2779: yat punaḥ parapratipattāvevoyujyate, tat parārthānumāna eva vaktavyamiti // 44 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2781: dṛśyaniṣedhe svabhāvānupalabdhiprayogaprasaṅgāt tathā ca sati na teṣāṃ dṛśyānupalabdheniṣedhaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:2790: yasmāt sarvatrānupalabdhau yeṣāṃ pratiṣedha uktasteṣāmupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānāṃ dṛśyānāmeva pratiṣedhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2797: yadi nāma svabhāvaviruddhādyupalabdhyā kāraṇādyanupalabdhyā ca pratiṣedha uktaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:2801: yasmād ye virodhinaḥ vyāpya- vyāpakabhūtāḥ kāryakāraṇabhūtāśca jñātāḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:2805: lakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ syāt, tadā kāryādeḥ pratiṣedhasiddhiḥ sambhavati, nānyatra // 45 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2815: upalabdhyanupalabdhī ca dveyeṣāṃ staḥ, te dṛśyā eva /
SA15dhnyabpu:2816: tasmāt svabhāpraviruddhādyu palabdhyā kāraṇādyanupalabdhyā copalabdhyanupalabdhimatāṃ viruddhādīnāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyamāṇo dṛśyānāmeva kṛto draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2817: bahuṣu codyeṣu prakrānteṣu parihārasamuccayārthaścakāro hetvartho bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:2818: yasmādidaṃ cedaṃ ca samādhānamasti, tasmād tattaccodyamayuktamiti cakārārthaḥ // 45 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2819: kasmāt punaḥ pratiṣedhyānāṃ viruddhādīnāmupalabdhyanupalabdhī veditavye? ityāha- anyeṣāmiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2820: upalabdhyanupalabdhimadbhayo 'nye 'nupalabdhā eva ye teṣāṃ virodhaśca kāryakāraṇabhāvaśca kenacit saha abhāvaśca vyāpyasya vyāpakasyābhāve na sidhyati,
SA15dhnyabpu:2821: yasmāt tato virodhakāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvāsiddhe kāraṇād upalabdhyanupalabdhimanta eva viruddhādayo niṣedhyāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2824: tadayamarthaḥ- virodhaśca kāryakāraṇabhāvaśca vyāpakābhāve vyāpyābhāvaśca dṛśyānupalabdhereveti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2827: vyāpakābhimatābhāve ca vyāpyābhimatābhāve niścite niścito vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2829: iha gṛhīte vṛkṣābhāve hi śiśapātvābhāvapratītau pratīto vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2833: vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaṃ ca smaratā virodha kāryakāarṇabhāva vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaviṣayābhāvapratipattinibandhanaṃ dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ smartavyā /
SA15dhnyabpu:2836: tathāhi- upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya niyatānuṣaṅgīṇo ye dṛṣṭāstatsannidhāne kasyacit tirobhāve tena saha virodhasya pratyāyanaṃ śakyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:2844: nanu tadanyenāpi kvacit siddhiriti cet? ucyate- viprakṛṣṭetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:2845: viprakṛṣṭī yo viṣayaḥ pratyakṣānumānanivṛttisvabhāvaḥ sa saṃśayasya hetuḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:2850: tatra yadyapi sampratitanī nāsti dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ, virodhādigrahaṇakāle tvāsīt /
SA15dhnyabpu:2852: tataḥ samprati nāsti dṛśyānupalabdhiprayogād bhidyante kāryānupalabdhyādiprayogāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2856: tadanena sarveṇa dṛśyānupalabdhāvantarbhāvo daśānāmamanupalabdhiprayogāṇāṃ pāramparyeṇa darśita ityavaseyam // 46 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2857: uktā dṛśyānupalabdhirabhāve, abhāvavyavahārasādhye ca pramāṇam, adṛśyānupalabdhistu kiṃsvabhāvā?
SA15dhnyabpu:2862: ityāha- pratyakṣānumānanivṛttirlakṣāṇaṃ svabhāvo yasyāḥ sā pratyakṣānumānanivṛttilakṣāṇā /
SA15dhnyabpu:2866: pramāṇanivṛttilakṣaṇā viprakṛṣṭaviṣayānupalabdhiḥ, pramānanivṛttirapi arthābhāvaṃ na sādhyati /
SA15dhnyabpu:2867: pramāṇaṃ tu arthakāryamiti pramāṇanivṛttyā kāraṇamātranivṛttinaṃ sidhyatīti // 48 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2869: nanu ca pramāṇāt prameyasattāvyavasthā, tataḥ pramāṇābhāvāt prameyābhāvapratipattiryuktā?
SA15dhnyabpu:2871: kāraṇaṃ vyāpakaṃ ca nivartamānaṃ kārya vyāpyaṃ ca nivartayet /
SA15dhnyabpu:2872: na ca pramāṇaṃ prameyasya karaṇam, nāpi vyāpakam /
SA15dhnyabpu:2875: yat punah pramāṇasattayā prameyasattā sidhyati, tadyuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:2879: tasmāt pramāṇāt prameyasattā vyavasthāpyā, na pramāṇābhāvāt prameyābhāvavyavastheti // 48 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2880: ācāryadharmottarakṛtāyāṃ vyāyabinduṭīkāyāṃ svārthānumānaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:2889: trīṇi rūpāṇi santi yasya tat trirūpam /
SA15dhnyabpu:2892: anumānaṃ ca samyagjñānamityuktam, kathamanumānaṃ vacanamiti cet? tatrāha- kāraṇa iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2893: svārtha- parārthānumānayoḥ svārtha vyākhyāya, parārtha vyākhyātukāma āhatrirūpaliṅgākhyānamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2894: trīṇi rūpāṇi- anvaya vyatireka pakṣadharmatvasaṃjñakāni yasya tat trirūpam /
SA15dhnyabpu:2900: nanu ca samyagjñānātmakamanumānamuktam, tat kimartha samprati vacanātmakamanumānamucyate?
SA15dhnyabpu:2904: tasmin kāraṇe vacane kāryasyānumānasya upacāraḥ samāropaḥ kriyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:2907: na yāvat kiñcit upacārādanumānaśabdena vaktuṃ śakyaṃ tāvat sarva vyākhyeyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:2910: tacca svayaṃ vā pratītamanumānasya nimittaṃ bhavati, pareṇa vā pratipāditaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:2911: tasmālliṅgasya svarūpaṃ ca vyākhyeyam, tatpratipādakaśca śabdaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:2920: taddvividhamiti / atra taditi parārthānumānam / trirūpaliṅgākhyānaṃ tat // 3 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2924: kiṃ tat prakāraheyamiti āha? āha- sādharmyavaditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:2925: samāno dharmo yasya sa sadharmā, sadharmaṇo bhāvaḥ sādharmyam, tadayasyāsti tat sādharmyavat /
SA15dhnyabpu:2926: visadṛśo dharmo yasya sa vidharmā, vidharmaṇo bhāvo vaidharmyam, tadayasyāsti tad vaidharmyavat /
SA15dhnyabpu:2929: tataḥ pratipādakaṃ śabdamavaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ darśayan anumānaśabdenoktavānācārya iti paramārthaḥ // 2 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2930: parārthānumānasya prakārabhedaṃ darśayitukāma āha- tad dvividhamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:2932: dvau vidhau= prakārau yasya tad dvividham // 3 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2933: kuto dvividham? ityāha- prayogasya śabdavyāpārasya bhedāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:2937: samāno dharmo 'sya so 'yaṃ sadharmā, tasya bhāvaḥ sādharmyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:2938: visadṛśo dharmo 'sya vidharmā, vidharmāṇo bhāvo vaidharmyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:2939: dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā saha sādhyadharmiṇaḥ sādṛśyaṃ hetukṛtaṃ sādharmyamucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:2941: tatra yasya sādhanavākyasya sādharmyamabhidheyaṃ tat sādharmyavat /
SA15dhnyabpu:2944: tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ ityatra kṛtakatvakṛtaṃ dṛṣṭānta sādhyadharmiṇoḥ sāduśyabhidheyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:2948: śabdastu kṛtakaḥ iti kṛtakatvākṛtakatvakṛtaṃ śabdākāśayoḥ sādhya dṛṣṭāntadharmoṇorasādṛśyamihābhidheyam // 5 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2951: 8 tatra sādharmyavatprayogaḥ- yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate so 'dvayava hāraviṣayaḥ siddhaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:2953: nopalabhyate ca kvacit pradeśaviśaṣe upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭaḥ- ityanupalabdhiprayogaḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:2957: tat kasmāt prayogabhedena dvividhamityucyate iti cet?
SA15dhnyabpu:2962: iha prayogasyaiva bhedaḥ, na tu sarvathāpi /
SA15dhnyabpu:2963: tathā hi- prathame vastuto 'nvayābhidhāne 'pi vyatirekaḥ sāmarthyādavagamyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:2964: dvitīye ca vastuto vyatirekā bhidhāne 'pi anvayo 'rthājjñāyate // 7 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2970: yat prayojanaṃ prakāśayitavyaṃ vastu uddiśyānumāne prayujyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:2976: tathā ca na tato bhedaḥ kaścit // 6 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2977: abhidheyabhedo 'pi tarhi na syāt? ityāha- anyatra prayogabhedāditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:2982: anvaye hi kathite vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena vyatirekagatirbhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:2985: na ca yatrābhidheyabhedaḥ, tatra sāmarthyagamyo 'pyartho bhidyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:2986: yasmāt pīno devadatto divā na bhuṃkte pīno devadatto rātrau bhuṃkte ityanayovakyiyorabhidheyabhede 'pi gamyamānamekameva,
SA15dhnyabpu:2988: 9 tathā svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ- yat sat tat sarvamanityam,
SA15dhnyabpu:2996: tena dṛṣṭāntakathanaṃ nopalabhyate iti anena pakṣadharma uktaḥ // 8 //
SA15dhnyabpu:2998: dvitīyasya hetoḥ sādharmyavān prayoga upadarśyate yat tatreti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3008: yathoktam- vyāptirvyāpakasya tatra bhāva eva vyāpyasya vā tatraiva bhāvaḥ iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3018: tata eva pramāṇādanena vākye nābhidhīyamānā vyāptirjñātavyā /
SA15dhnyabpu:3019: samprati vyāpti kathayitvā dṛśyānupalambhasya pakṣadharmatvaṃ darśayitumāha nopalabhyate ceti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3026: sa evābhāvavyavahārādhikaraṇaṃ yaḥ pratipattaḥ pratyakṣaḥ, nānyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3029: yathā cāsato 'pi ghaṭasya samāropitamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvaṃ tathā vyākhyātam // 8 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3031: yathānupalabdheḥ, tathā svabhāvahetoḥ sādharmyavān prayoga ityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3032: yat saditi sattvamanūdya tat sarvamanityamityanityanityatvaṃ vidhīyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3037: yaditi yogyaṃ vastumātraṃ sat, tat sarvamakhilamanityam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3039: śuddhasya svabhāvahetoḥ prayoga iti / nirviśeṣaṇasya svabhāvahetoḥ prayoga iti śeṣaḥ // 9 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3042: ātmabhūtadharmasyaiva bhedaṃ kṛtvā svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ kṛtaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3053: anityatvādanyatra nityatve sattvaṃ nāstītyevaṃ sattvamanityatve sādhye niyataṃ khyāpitaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:3063: svabhāvaṃ bhūtaḥ tadātmako dhamaḥ, tasya bhedena /
SA15dhnyabpu:3068: tathā ca vyatiriktamevotpattyā viśiṣṭa vastu utpattimaduktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3069: tena svabhāvabhūtena dharmeṇa kalpitabhedena viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvaḥ prayukto viditavyaḥ // 10 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3071: kṛtakatvamanūdyānityatvaṃ vidhīyate- iti anityatve niyataṃ kṛtakatvamuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3075: tasya bhedena bhinnenopādhinā viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvaḥ prayukta ityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3076: 12 apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpattau kṛtaka iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3079: tatrāha- apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpatau kṛtaka iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3081: yaśca bhāvaḥ svabhāniṣpattaye hetūnāṃ vyāpāramapekṣate iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3085: tathā hi prayatne= hetuvyāpāre sati yasya siddhiḥ sa prayatnāntarīyaka iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3086: tena anityaṃ prayatnāntaroyakatvāda ityayanapi anabhivyaktaviśeṣaṇaḥ svabhāvahetureva /
SA15dhnyabpu:3088: pratyayabhedena bhettuṃ śīla yasya sa pratyayabhedabhedī, tasya bhāvaḥ pratyayabhedabheditvam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3090: tathā hi- svalpakardamapiṇḍād ghaṭaḥ kṣudro bhavati, mahatastu mahān bhavvati /
SA15dhnyabpu:3098: nanu ca citraguśabde vyatiriktasya viśeṣaṇasya vācakaścitraśabdo gośabdaśvāsti,
SA15dhnyabpu:3101: pareṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ vyāpāraḥ svabhāvasya niṣpattau niṣpatyarthamapekṣitaḥ paravyāpāro yena sa tathoktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3103: yasmādapekṣitaparavyāpāraḥ kṛtaka ucyate, tasmād vyatiriktena viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāva ucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3106: ataeva saṃjñāprakāro 'yaṃ kṛtakaśabdaḥ, yasmāt saṃjñāyāmayaṃ kan pratyayo vihitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3107: yatra ca viśeṣaṇamantarbhāvyate, tatra viśeṣaṇāpdaṃ na prayujyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3108: kvacittu prtīyamānaṃ viśeṣaṇam, yathā kṛta ityukte hetubirityetat pratīyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3109: tatra ca hetuśabdaḥ prayujyate, kadācinna vā prayujyate // 12 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3113: 14 sannutpattimān kṛtako vā śabda iti pakṣadharmopadarśanam //
SA15dhnyabpu:3114: 15 sarve ete sādhanadharmāḥ yathāsvaṃ pramāṇaiḥ siddha sādhana dharmamātrānubandhe eva sādhyadharme 'vagantavyāḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:3117: pūrva trayāṇāṃ svabhāvahetūnāmanvayamātramuktam, idānī tena kāraṇena pakṣadharmā ucyante /
SA15dhnyabpu:3118: san śabdaḥ, utpattimān śabdaḥ, kṛtakaḥ śabda iti prayogabhedadarśanāthaṃ vā iti // 14 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3119: tanmātrānubandhini sādhyadharme svabhāvo hetuḥ iti pūrva svabhāvahetulakṣaṇaṃ yadabhihitam,
SA15dhnyabpu:3121: pūrva yeṣāṃ trividhānāṃ svabhāvahetūnāṃ pakṣadharmā uktāḥ, te yathāsvaṃ pramāṇairiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3123: prayatnānantarīyakatvādīnāṃ te 'pi svabhāvahetoḥ prayogāḥ bhinnaviśeṣaṇasvabhāvābhidhāyino draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3126: tena pratyayabhedena bhettuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa pratyayabhedo śabdaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:3135: evamartha caitadākhyātam- vācakabhedānmā bhūt kasyacit svabhāvahetāvapi prayukte vyāmoha iti // 13 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3136: atha kimete svabhāvahetavaḥ siddhasambandhe svabhāve sādhye prayoktavyāḥ?
SA15dhnyabpu:3139: gamakatvāt sādhanāni, parāśritatvācca dharmāḥ, sādhanadharmā eva sādhanadharmamātram /
SA15dhnyabpu:3150: siddhaḥ sādhanadharmāmātrānubandho yasya sādhya dharmasya tasmin /
SA15dhnyabpu:3151: yathāsvaṃ sādhyadharme sādhanadharmamātrānubandhe sādhite eva te pakṣadharmā hetutvenābhidheyā iti // 15 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3152: kasmācca sādhyadharme sādhanadahrmamātrānubandha iti cet? tatrāha- tasyaiveti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3154: anyaśca kṛtakaḥ, anyaśca anitya iti tu na /
SA15dhnyabpu:3155: kathamiti cet? hetupratyayairyat kriyate tad vinaśyatsvabhāvameveti // 16 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3157: yasya sādhyadharmasya yadātmīyaṃ pramāṇaṃ tenaiva pramāṇena siddha ityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3158: svabhāvahetūnāṃ ca bahubhedadatvāt sambandhasādhanānyapi pramāṇāni bahūnīti pramāṇairiti bahuvacana nirdeśaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3160: tadayaṃ paramārthaḥ- na hetuḥ pradīpavat yogyatayā gamakaḥ, apitu nāntarīyakatayā viniścitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3161: sādhyāvinbhāvitvaniścayanameva hi hetoḥ sādhyapratipādanavyāpāraḥ, nānyaḥ kaścit /
SA15dhnyabpu:3162: prathamaṃ bādhakena pramāṇena sādhyapratibandho niścetavyo hetoḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3164: kṛtakatvaṃ nāmānityasvabhāvamiti sāmānyena smṛtamarya punarviśeṣe yojayati- idamapi kṛtakatvaṃ śabde vartamānamanityasvabhāvameveti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3168: tena niścitatanmātrānubandhe sādhyadharme svabhāva hetavaḥ prayoktavyāḥ, nānyatretyuktam // 15 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3169: yadyevaṃ sambandho niścetavyaḥ sāśyasya sādhanena saha,
SA15dhnyabpu:3175: yo hi sādhyadharmaḥ sādhanadharmamātrānubandhavān sa eva tasya sādhanadharmasya svabhāvaḥ, nānyaḥ // 16 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3181: kathaṃ sādhyānanubandhī syāt tathā hi tanmātrānubandho svabhāva eveti // 17 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3182: tacca kasmāt iti cet? tatrāha- tanniṣpattāviti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3183: yadi sādhanadharmasya kṛtakatvādeḥ siddhau sādhyo 'nityatvādinaṃ siddhayati,
SA15dhnyabpu:3184: tadā kṛtakatvānityatve paramārthata ekasvabhāve na syātām // 19 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3185: bhavatu īdṛśa eva svabhāvaḥ, svabhāva eva tu sādhye kasmād hetuprayogaḥ?
SA15dhnyabpu:3188: tasmāt sa eva sādhyaḥ kartavyoḥ yaḥ sādhanasya svabhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:3190: yadi sādhyadharmaḥ sādhanasya svabhavaḥ syāt, pratijñārthaikadeśastarhi hetuḥ syāt?
SA15dhnyabpu:3195: niścayārūḍhaṃ ca rūpaṃ samāropitena bhedenetaretaravyāvṛttikena bhinnamiti anyat sādhanam, anyat sādhyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3196: dūrāddhi śākhādimānartho vṛkṣaḥ iti niścīyate na śiśapeti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3197: atha ca sa eva vṛkṣaḥ, saiva śiśapā /
SA15dhnyabpu:3199: tasmāt niścayarūḍharūpāpekṣayā anyat sādhanam, anyat sādhyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3202: kasmāt punaḥ sādhanadharmamātrānubandhyeva sādhyaḥ svabhāvaḥ, nānyaḥ? ityāha- tanniṣapttāviti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3210: na ca viruddhayorbhāvābhāvayoraikyaṃ yujyateḥ, viruddhadharmasaṃsargātmaka katvādekatvābhavasya /
SA15dhnyabpu:3213: 21 kāryahetoḥ prayogaḥ- yatra dhūmastatrāgniḥ, yathā mahānasādau / asti ceha dhūma iti //
SA15dhnyabpu:3214: 22 ihāpi siddhe eva kāryakāraṇabhāve kāraṇe sādhye kāryaheturvaktavyaḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:3218: tadavaśyamevānutpannasya kasyāpi vināśasyāpi na sambhava iti // 20 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3222: yatreti asmin pardeśe dhūmastatra sarvatrāgnirityanvaya iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3226: abhimatadeśe ca dhūmo dṛśyata iti pakṣadharmo darśitaḥ // 21 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3227: kāryahetāvapi pūrva kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sādhanīyaḥ anantaraṃ ca kāraṇasādhanārtha kāryaheturvaktavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3228: tathā hi- svarūpeṇa niścitameva liṅga jñeyam, na tu aniścitameveti // 22 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3230: tato niṣpannāniṣpannayoviruddharmasaṃsargātmako bhedo bhedahetuśca kāraṇabheda iti kuta ekatvam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3232: mā bhūt paścānniṣpannaḥ pūrvajasya svabhāvaḥ, sādhyastu kasmānna bhavati? ityāha- vyabhicaretyādi //
SA15dhnyabpu:3233: pūrvajena paścānniṣpannasya vyabhicāraḥ= parityāgo yastasya sambhavācca na pūrvaniṣpannasya paścānniṣpannaḥ sādhyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3236: tathā ca siddhasādhanadharma mātranubandha eva svabhāve svabhavahetavaḥ prayoktavyā iti sthitam // 20 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3239: yatra dhūma iti dhūmamanūdya tatrāgniriti agnevidhiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3251: 23 vaidharmyavataḥ prayogaḥ- yat sad upalabdhilaksāṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata eva /
SA15dhnyabpu:3253: na caiva mihopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya sata upalabdhiḥ rghaṭasyeti anupalabdhiprayogaḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:3254: 24 asati anityatve, nāsti sattvam utpattimattvaṃ kṛtakatvaṃ vā /
SA15dhnyabpu:3255: san ca śabda utpattimān kṛtako veti svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:3256: vaidharmyatyādi / yāni ca vaidharmyavadanumānāni, tāni vaktavyāni /
SA15dhnyabpu:3258: sacca vastu kimapyupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ yadi syāt, tadā avaśyamupalabhyeta /
SA15dhnyabpu:3263: upalabdhirityupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto yādṛśo nīlādiviśeṣa upalabhyate, tādṛśo ghaṭa iha nāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3269: san ca śabda utpattimān, kṛtako veti pakṣadharmā uktāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3277: tadanena dṛśyasya sattvaṃ darśanaviṣayatvena vyāptaṃ kathitam, asattvanivṛtiśca /
SA15dhnyabpu:3280: tathā ca sādhyanivṛttiḥ sādhananivṛtti niyatatvāt sādhananivṛttyā vyāptā kathitā /
SA15dhnyabpu:3281: yadi ca dharmiṇi sādhayadharmo na bhaved, heturapi na bhavet /
SA15dhnyabpu:3284: ato vyāpakasya sādhanābhāvasyābhāvād vyāpyasya sādhyābhāvasyābhāva iti sādhyagatirbhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:3285: tato vaidharmyaprayoge sādhnābhāve sādhyābhāvo niyato darśanīyaḥ sarvatreti nyāyaḥ // 23 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3289: 25 asatyagnau na bhavatyeva dhūmaḥ / atra cāsti dhūma iti kāryahetoḥ prayogaḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:3303: sāmarthya ca kīdṛśamīt cet? āha- asatīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3304: yadi vyatireko na syāt, tadā sādhyena hetoranvayo 'pyasidha eva syāditi // 27 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3309: tato vyāpyo 'pi sādhyābhāvo nivartata iti sādhyagati // 24 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3315: nanu ca sādharmyavati vyatirekonoktaḥ, vaidharmyavati cānvayaḥ, tat kathametat trirūpāliṅgākhyānām?
SA15dhnyabpu:3317: sādharmyaiṇāpyabhidheyena yukte prayoge kriyamāṇe arthāt sāmarthyāt vaidharmyasya vyatirekasya gatirbhavatīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3320: yadi nāma vyatireko 'nvayavatā noktaḥ, tathāpi anvayavācakaḥ sāmarthyā devāvasīyate // 26 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3322: asati tasmin vyatireke buddhayā vyavasite sādhyena hetoranvayasya buddhayāśyavasitasyābhāvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:3323: sādhye niyataṃ sādhanamanvayavākyādavasyatā sādhyābhāve sādhanaṃ nāśaṅkanīyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3330: 31 sa ca dviprakāraḥ sarvasya tādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ, tadutpattilakṣaṇaścetyuktama //
SA15dhnyabpu:3332: atha tacca sādharmya kīdṛśamiti cet? āha- asatīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3333: yadi sādhyena hetoranvayo na syāt tadā sādhyābhāve 'pi hetorabhāvaḥ katham syāt // 29 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3334: anvayābhāve vyatireko 'siddha ityetat kasmāditi cet? tatrāha- nahītyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:3335: yadi svabhāvapratibandha ātmā svarūpeṇa pratibandho na syāt tadā ekanivṛttāvapi aparasya nivṛttirniyamena na syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:3338: sarvasyaiva padārthasya yaḥ ko 'pi pratibandho yogyaḥ samupalabhyate sa sarvaḥ prakāradvaya evāntarbhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:3341: yathā anvayavākye, tathā arthādeva vaidharmyeṇa prayoge 'nvayasyābhidhīyamānasyāpi gatiḥ // 28 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3342: katham? asati tasmin anvaye buddhigṛhīte sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvasyāsiddhe ranavasāyāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:3343: hetvabhāve sādhyābhāvaṃ niyataṃ vyatirekavākyādavasyatā hetuḥ sambhave sādhyābhāvo nāśaṅkanīyaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:3344: itarathā hetvabhāve niyato na syāt pratītaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3348: tathāpi kimīt hetusambhave sādhyasambhavaḥ? ityāha- nahīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3349: svabhāvena pratibandho yastsminnasatyekasya sādhyasya nivṛttyā nāparasya sādhanasya niyamena yuktā niyamavatī nivṛttiḥ // 30 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3350: sa ca svabhāvapratibandho dviprakāraḥ sarvasya pratibaddhasya /
SA15dhnyabpu:3351: tādātmyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nimittaṃ yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3353: yo yatra pratibaddhastasya sa pratibandhaviṣayo 'rthaḥ svabhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ vāsyat anyasmin prasiddhatvānupapatteḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3356: 32 tena hi nivṛtti kathayatā pratibandho darśanīyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3358_0: yacca pratibandhopadarśanaṃ tadevānvayavacanamiyekenāpi vākyena anvayamukhena vyatirekamukhena
SA15dhnyabpu:3358_1: vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayorliṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavatīti nāvaśyaṃ
SA15dhnyabpu:3359: miti tasya ātmā tadātmā, tadātmano bhāvastādātmyam, tādātmyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yaḥ sa tādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3360: tasmādutpattistadutpattiḥ, tadutpattirlakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa tadutpattilakṣaṇa iti vigrahaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3363: abhāve na tena hetunā kasyacidekasya nivṛtyā aparanivṛttiramidhīyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3366: yadayavam syādeva, tataśca kimāyātam? iti cedāha- yadeva pratibandhopadarśanaṃ tadevānvaya iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3367: tasmādekenāpi vākyenānvayamukhena vyatirekamukena vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayorliṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛta bhavatīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3371: tena sādhyasya nivṛttau sādhanasya nivṛtti kathayatā pratibandho nivarttya nivartakayordarśanīyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3372: yadi hi sādhanaṃ sādhye pratibaddham bhavet, evaṃ sādhyanivṛtau tanniyamena nivarteta /
SA15dhnyabpu:3374: tasmāt sādhyanivṛtau yat sādhana nivṛttivacanaṃ tenākṣiptaṃ pratibandhopadarśanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3377: yasmāt dṛṣṭānte pramāṇena pratibandho darśyamāna evānvayaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:3380: tathā ca anvaya eva jñāto bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:3383: tasmādekenāpi sapakṣe cāsapakṣe ca sattvāsattvayoḥ khyāpanaṃ kṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3384: anvayo mukham= upāyo 'bhidheyatvād yasya tad anvayamukhaṃ vākyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3388: tasmād ekasmin sādhanavākye dvayoranvaya vyatirekayoravaśyameva prayogau na na kartavyāḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:3389: 33 anupalabdhāvapi yatsad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata evetyukte 'nupalabhyamānaṃ tādṛśamasaditi pratīteranvayadisśiḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:3391: prayogaḥ kriyate ced vyatirekamukhena karaṇamapi yuktameva,
SA15dhnyabpu:3392: tathāpi uktaprakāreṇa sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ sattvāsattvayorabhidhānameva sattvāsattvapradarśanaṃ bhavatīti ubhayenāpi liṅgena pratyekaṃ kriyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3394: tasmādekasminneva prayoge sādharmyavato vaidharmyavataśca vākyadvayasya prayogo nāvaśyaṃ kāryaḥ // 32 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3404: sādharmyavati vaidharmyavati cānumāne ubhayatrāi pakṣanirdeśo nāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3405: evaṃ ca pakṣānirdheśābhāva eva kalpyata iti cet? tatrāha- dvayorapīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3406: avaśyameva pakṣo nidehsyaḥ iti yo niyamaḥ, sa tu nāsti // 34 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3416: yadi ca sādhanasambhave 'pi sādhyanivṛttirbhavet na sādhanābhāvena vyāptā bhavet /
SA15dhnyabpu:3417: ato vyāptiṃ pratipadyamānena sādhanasambhavaḥ sādhyasambhavena vyāptaḥ pratipattavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3421: yataśca sādhanaṃ sādhyadharmapratibaddhaṃ tādātmya tadutpattibhyāṃ pratipattavyaṃ dvayorapi prayogayoḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:3423: yat sādhanaṃ sādhyaniyataṃ pratītaṃ tata eva sādhyadharmiṇi dṛṣṭāt sādhyapratītiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3426: nopalabhyate cātrāpi upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa iti sāmarthyādeva iha ghaṭo nāstīti bhavati //
SA15dhnyabpu:3427: 36 tathā vaidharmyavatprayoge 'pi yaḥ sadvayavahāraviṣaya upalabdhilaksāṇaprāptaḥ sa upalabhyata eva /
SA15dhnyabpu:3428: na tathātra tādṛśo ghaṭa upalabhyate ityukte sāmarthyādeva neha sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti bhavati //
SA15dhnyabpu:3429: upalabdhilakṣaṇarpāpto yāvānnopalabhyate sa sarvo 'sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti nikhilapadārthosaṃhāreṇa anvayaḥ kārya iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3430: nikhilapadārthopasaṃhāreṇānvayo yatra ca pakṣadharmaḥ ityetayonirdeśa tacca sādhyaṃ tatra sāmarthyena siddhayatīti pakṣanirdeśasya kiṃ praojanam? // 35 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3431: nikhilapadārthopasaṃhāreṇa yo vyatirekanirdeśaḥ pakṣadharmaśceti tadubhayasāmarthyena pratijñāpratītenaṃ pratijñānirdeśaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3433: yadā sāmarthyena pratijñārthapratītirjāyate tadā pratijñāvacanaśravaṇe uparodhenāpi ka āgrahī syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:3438: sādharmyavati prayoge 'pi sāmarthyādeva neha pradeśe ghaṭaḥ iti bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:3440: ityāha- yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate iti anupalambhānuvādaḥ so 'sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3442: tathā ca sati dṛśyānupalambho 'sadvayavahārayogyatvena vyāpto darśitah /
SA15dhnyabpu:3443: nopalabhyate ca ityādinā sādhyadharmiṇi sattvaṃ liṅgasya darśitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3444: yadi ca sādhyadharmastatra sādhyadharmiṇi na bhavet, sādhanadharmo 'pi na bhavet /
SA15dhnyabpu:3446: yathā sādharmyavatprayoge tathā vaidharmyavatprayoge 'pi neha sadvayavahāraviṣayo 'sti ghaṭa iti bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:3453: anena ca sādhyanivṛtiḥ sādhananivṛttyā vyāptā darśitā /
SA15dhnyabpu:3455: yathānyo dṛśya upalabhyate na tathātra pradeśe tādṛśa iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3459: yadi ca sādhyadharmaḥ sādhyadharmiṇi na syāt sādhana
SA15dhnyabpu:3464: bhidhānārthe pakṣanirdeśe ca doṣaḥ ko 'pi nāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3466: yadi punaḥ sarvathā pakṣanirdeśapratiṣedha evābhirpetaḥ syāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:3468: yadi viniścayavacanābhidhāne ca pakṣanirdeśa iti ucyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:3470: tarhi kīdṛglakṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ pakṣatvenābhidheya iti ced? āha- kīdṛśa iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3472: tathā pratyakṣādinā ca na nirākriyate tādṛśo 'rthaḥ pakṣa iti abhidheyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3475: sādhyarūpeṇa vinā anyarūpeṇa na yujyate iti svarūpeṇoktameva sādhyatvenāvagantavyamiti // 39 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3480: ataḥ sāmarthyāt nāstyatra ghaṭa iti pratītena pakṣanirdeśaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3481: evaṃ kārya svabhāvahetvorapi samarthyāt sampratyaya iti na pakṣanirdeśaḥ // 36 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3482: kīdṛśaḥ punararthaḥ pakṣa iti / anena śabdena nirdeśyo vaktavyaḥ?: iti // 37 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3488: evambhūtaḥ san pratyakṣādibhiḥ anirākṛto yo 'rthaḥ sa pakṣa ityucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3489: atha yadi pakṣo na nirdeśyaḥ, kathamanirdeśyasya lakṣaṇamuktam?
SA15dhnyabpu:3490: na sādhanavākyāvayavatvādasya lakṣaṇamuktam, api tvasādhye kecit sādhyam, sādhyaṃ cā sādhyamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3496: evaśabdaṃ vivarītumāha- svarūpeṇaiveti / nanu caivaśabdaḥ kevala eva
SA15dhnyabpu:3498: śabde 'siddhatvāt sādhyaṃ bhavatīti na puanratra sādhyatvenaiveṣṭam,
SA15dhnyabpu:3503: yaḥ śabdaḥ so 'nityaḥ ityucyamāne tacca cākṣuṣatvaṃ śabde 'siddhamiti sādhyaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:3505: yadi tasmin sādhyarūpamastyeva, kasmānna pakṣa iti ced? āha- atreti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3510: sādhanaṃ kathayatā svayaṃ nirdeśyo yo 'rthaḥ sa eva pakṣaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:3512: pratyavamraṣṭavyaḥ, tat kimartha svarūpaśabdena saha pratyavamuṣṭaḥ?
SA15dhnyabpu:3514: padāntarābhihitasyarthasya viśeṣa dayotayati- iti padāntareṇa viśeṣyavācinā saha nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3520: śabdayānityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ śabde 'siddhatvāt sādhyam ityanena sādhyatveneṣṭimāha /
SA15dhnyabpu:3526: yataḥ sādhanatvenābhihitam, ataḥ sādhanatvenāpīṣṭam, na sādhyatvenaiveti // 41 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3527: svayamityanena svayaṃ śabdaṃ vyākhyeyamupakṣipya tasyārthamāha- svayamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3528: svayaṃśabdo nipātaḥ ātmanaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhayantasya ātmanā iti ca tṛtīyāntasyārthe vartate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3532: tato yasya vādina ātmā tṛtīyārtha yuktaḥ, sa eva tṛtīyārthayukto nirdiṣṭo vādineti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3533: na tu svayaṃśabdasya vādinā ityeṣa paryāyaḥ // 42 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3534: kaḥ punarasau vādī? ityāha- yastadeti / vādakāle, sādhanamāha / aneka
SA15dhnyabpu:3535: 44 etena yadayapi kvacit śāstre sthitaḥ sādhanamaha,
SA15dhnyabpu:3536: taccāstrakāreṇa tasmin dharmiṇyanekadharmābhyupagame 'pīti yastadā tena vādinā dharmaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyo netara ityuktaṃ bhavati //
SA15dhnyabpu:3537: 45 iṣṭa iti yatrārthe vivādena sādhanamupanyastaṃ tasya siddhimiccatā so 'nukto pi vacanena sādhyo bhavati //
SA15dhnyabpu:3538: teneti vādinā nirdeśya eva pakṣa ucyate // 43 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3539: kaścit kvacit śāstre sthitaḥ pakṣe kṛtaniścaya eva /
SA15dhnyabpu:3540: astu tādṛśo niścayaḥ, tathāpi yadi śāstrāduddhṛtya pramāṇikriyate iti śeṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3541: vādī yasmin śāstre sādhanaṃ kathayati taccāstrakāreṇa vitarkaviṣayadharmiṇi yadi bahavo dharmā aṅgīkriyante, tathāpi ca /
SA15dhnyabpu:3542: vādinaiva yo dharma sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3543: śāstrakāreroṣṭastu na yasmād vādinā nirdeśyasya pakṣatvamaṅgīkriyate tasmād vādinā śāstrāṅgīkāradvāreṇopakārako yo dharmaḥ pariṣkartumiṣyate sa eva sādhyaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:3546: yadayavam, vādinaḥ iṣṭaḥ sādhyaḥ ityuktam, etena ca kimuktena?
SA15dhnyabpu:3547: anena tadā vādakāle tena vādinā svayaṃ yo dharmaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:3551: atha kasmin sati anyadharmasādhyatvasya sambhavaḥ, yannivṛttayartha tad vaktavyam?
SA15dhnyabpu:3553: yaccāstraṃ tena vādinābhyupagataṃ taccāstrakāreṇa tasmin sādhyadharmiṇi anekasya dharmasyābhyupagame sati anyadharmasādhyatvasambhavaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3554: tathā hi- śāstraṃ yenābhyupagataṃ tatsiddho dharmaḥ sarva eva tena sādhya ityasti vipratipattiḥ, anenāpāsyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3555: anekadharmābhyupagame 'pi sati sa eva sādhyo yo vādinā iṣṭaḥ, nānya iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3558: satyamḥ āhopuruṣikayā tu yadayapi kvaciccāstre sthita iti kiñciccāstramabhyupagataḥ sādhanamāha,
SA15dhnyabpu:3559: tathāpi ya eva tasyeṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyaḥ iti jñāpanāyedamuktam // 44 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3560: iṣṭaśabdamukṣipya vyācaṣṭe- iṣṭa iti / yatrārtha ātmani viruddho
SA15dhnyabpu:3563: atra ātmārthā ityanukte 'pi ātmārthataiva sādhyaṃ bhavatīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3567: vivādādhikaraṇaṃ tad vastu sādhayitumiccatā sādhyatvenopanyasto 'rtha eveṣṭa iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3568: yadi vitarkaviṣayārtho 'so vacanena nābhidhīyate, tathāpi sa eva sādhyo bhavati // 45 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3569: tacca kasmād iti ced? āha- tadadhikaraṇatvāditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:3570: tata eva yasmād vivādaḥ kathamasau vivāda eva sādhyo na syāt // 46 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3571: yacca vivādādhikaraṇaṃ tad vacanenānuktamapi sādhyameveṣyata iti katham iti ced? tathāha- yatheti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3572: vādaḥ prakrāntaḥ- nāsti ātmā ityātmapratiṣedhavādaḥ ātmasattāvādaviruddhaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:3575: tasyātmārthasya siddhi niścayam iccatā vādinā so 'rthaḥ sādhya ityuktaṃ bhavati- iṣṭaśabdena /
SA15dhnyabpu:3576: yat tad ityukta bhavati iti grahaṇamante tadihāpekṣya vākyaṃ samāpayitavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3577: yadyapi parārthānumāne ukta eva sādhyo yuktaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:3581: so 'rthaḥ adhikaraṇam= āśrayo yasya sa tadadhikaraṇo vivādaḥ, tasya bhāvastattvam, tasmāditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:3582: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yasmād vivādaṃ nirākartumiccatā vādinā sādhanamupanyastam,
SA15dhnyabpu:3583: tasmād yad adhikaraṇaṃ vivādasya tadeva sādhyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3584: yato viruddhaṃ vādamapanetuṃ sādhanamukpanyastaṃ taccet na sādhyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:3586: anuktamapi parārthānumāne sādhyamiṣṭam, tadudāharati- parārthā iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3587: cakṣurādiryeṣāṃ śrotrādīnāṃ te cakṣurādaya iti dharmī /
SA15dhnyabpu:3591: śayanam āsanaṃ ca te ādau yasya taccayanāsanādi puruṣopabhogāṅgaṃ saṅghātarūpam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3596: 49 tatra pratyakṣanirākṛto yathā- aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti //
SA15dhnyabpu:3598: tathā cakṣurādayo 'pi saṅghātarūpatvāt parārthā eveti prayogārthaḥ // 47 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3599: asmin prayoge yadayapi cakṣurādaya ātmārthā iti noktam, tathāpi ātmārthataiva sādhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3608: tataḥ sāṅkhayena svavādaviruddhaṃ bauddhavādaṃ hetūkṛtya viruddhavādanirākaraṇāya svavādapratiṣṭhāpanāya ca sādhanamupanyastam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3610: śayanāsanādiṣu hi puruṣopabhogāṅgeṣu ātmārthatvenāvvayo na prasiddhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3616: parasyārthakāri vijñānaṃ setsyatīti sāmarthyāt ātmārthatvaṃ sidhyati cakṣurādīnām- iti matvā parārthagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3618: api tu prativādino vivādāspadatvād vādinaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭam uktamanuktaṃ vā prakaraṇagamyaṃ sādhyam- ityuktaṃ bhavati // 47 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3623: etallakṣaṇena yoge 'pyartho na pakṣa iti pradarśanārtham pratipādanāya anirākṛtagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3625: ityāha- yaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭo 'rthaḥ pratyakṣaṃ ca anumānaṃ ca pratīniśca svavacanaṃ ca- etairnirākriyate viparītaḥ sādhyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:3628: teṣu caturṣu pratyakṣādinirākṛteṣu pratyakṣanirākṛtaḥ kīdṛśaḥ? yathiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3633: tadā so 'rthaḥ pakṣo na bhavatīti pradarśanārthamanirākṛta ityuktam // 48 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3642: aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti partijñā tu pratyakṣeṇa nirākriyate/
SA15dhnyabpu:3643: tathā hi- karṇavijñānasya śabdaprakāśakatvaṃ prāṇībhiḥ sarvaiḥ svayamavagamyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3644: tena śabde śrāvaṇatvasya svakīyajñānena pratīteraśrāvaṇatvaṃ nirākriyate // 49 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3645: atra- ghaṭasya nityatvaṃ pratijñātaṃ kṛtādyanumānena nirākriyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3646: tathā hi kṛtakamanityaṃ dṛṣṭam, ghaṭo 'pi kṛtaka iti, tena kuto nityatvam // 50 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3647: yadi kenacit śaśī na candraśabdabhidheyaḥ iti pratijñā kriyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:3648: sa tu śaśī candraśabdābhidheya eva iti prasiddhayā nirākriyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3649: api ca sarveṣvartheṣu sarvasya śabdasya vācyatayāpi nirākriyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3657: pratītyā nirākṛtaḥ acandra iti candraśabdavācyo na bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:3662: tena vikalpajñānena pratītirūpeṇa śaśinaścandraśabdavācyatvaṃ siddhameva / tathāhi-
SA15dhnyabpu:3664: yaccabdākārasaṃsargayogyaṃ tat sāṅketikena śabdena vaktuṃ śakyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3665: ataḥ pratītirūpeṇa vikalpavijñānaviṣayatvena siddhaṃ candraśabdavācyatvam, acandratvasya bādhakam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3668: tataḥ svabhāvahetusiddhaṃ candraśabdavācyatvam avācyatvasya bādhakaṃ draṣṭavyam // 51 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3670: kenacid anumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ na bhavati ityucyamāne tat svavacanena viruddham /
SA15dhnyabpu:3671: anumānaṃ pramāṇameva yadi na syāt, etat vacanamapi na vaktavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3673: anumānaṃ ca yadi pramāṇaṃ na syāt vākyaṃ tāvat kutaḥ pramāṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3674: tad vākyamapramāṇaṃ cet, kasmāducyate iti svavacanena viruddham // 52 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3675: svavacanaṃ pratijñārthasyātmauyo vācakaḥ śabdaḥ, tena nirākṛtaḥ pratijñārtho na sādhyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3678: sa nānumānaṃ pramāṇam ityanena svavācakena vākyena bādhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3679: vākyaṃ hi etat prayujyamānaṃ vaktuḥ śābdapratyayasya sadarthatvamiṣṭaṃ sūcayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:3680: tathā hi- madvākyād yo 'rthasampratyayastavotpadyate so 'satyārthaḥ iti darśayan vākyameva noccārayed vaktā,
SA15dhnyabpu:3683: yo 'pi hi sarva mithyā bravīmi iti vakti,
SA15dhnyabpu:3685: yadi etad vākyaṃ satyārthatvamādarśitam, evaṃ vākyāntarāṇyātmāyānyasatyārthāni darśitāni bhavanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3686: etadeva tu yadyasatyārtham, anyānyasatyārthāni na darśatāni bhavanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3688: tasmād vākyaprabhavavākyārthālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārtha darśayannev vaktā vākyamuccārayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:3689: tathā ca sati vāhyavastunāntarīyakaṃ śabdaṃ darśayatā śabdajaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārtha darśayitavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3690: tato bāhyārthakāryāccabdādutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārthamādarśayatā kāryaliṅgajamanumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ śābdaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:3691: tasmāt nānumānaṃ pramāṇam iti bruvatā śābdasya pratyayasyāsatrārtho grāhya uktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3696: tadevaṃ svavacnānumitena sattvenāsattvaṃ bādhyamānaṃ svavacanena bādhitamuktamityayamatrārthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3700: tadayuktamḥ yata iha pratīteḥ svabhāvahetutvam, svavacanasya ca kārya
SA15dhnyabpu:3707: tenaiva svarūpeṇa vādina iṣṭo 'nirākṛtaḥ pakṣa iti pakṣalakṣaṇamana vadayaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati //
SA15dhnyabpu:3708: atrāgamaviruddha svavacanaviruddhe 'ntabhūta iti sarve pakṣābhāsāścatvāra ityuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3717: nirākṛtamātrasya ca viparītaṃ pakṣatvena draṣṭavyamityayamartha ukto bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:3720: abhiprākāryatvaṃ ca vāstavameva śabdasya tatastadiha na gṛhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3726: api ca, na svābhiprāyanivedanāya śabda uccāryate, api tu bāhyasattvapratipādanāya /
SA15dhnyabpu:3729: evaṃ ca sati anirākṛtagrahaṇena anantaroktāścatvāraḥ pakṣavadavabhāsanta iti pakṣābhāsā nirastā bhavanti // 53 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3730: samprati pakṣalakṣaṇapadāni yeṣāṃ vyavaccedakāni teṣāṃ vyavaccedena yādṛśaḥ pakṣārtho labhyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:3731: taṃ darśayituṃ vyavaccedayāna saṃkṣipya darśayati- evamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3733: siddhasya viparyayeṇa viparītvena hetunā sādhyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3734: yasmādarthāt siddho 'rtho viparītaḥ sa sādhya ityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3737: asiddho 'pi na sarvaḥ, api tu sādhanatvenoktasyāsiddhasyāpi viparyayeṇa /
SA15dhnyabpu:3756: uktvā hetvābhāsāsasya sambandha ucyate / tadā nyūnamiti sādhanadoṣo bhavati // 55 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3757: trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāṃ yogyamekamapi yadayuktamai vādiprativādinorasiddhaṃ sandigdhaṃ vā syat,
SA15dhnyabpu:3760: yaścāyaṃ pañcabhirvyavccedayai rahito 'rthosiddho 'sādhanaṃ vādinaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭa ukto 'nukto vā pramāṇairanirākṛtaḥ sādhyaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:3761: sa evāso svarūpeṇaiva svayamiṣṭo 'nirākṛta etaiḥ padairukta ityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3762: yaścāyaṃ sādhayḥ sa pakṣa iti ucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3768: prasaṅgāgataṃ ca pakṣalakṣaṇamabhidhāya hetvābhāsān vaktukāmasteṣāṃ prastāvaṃ racayati- trirūpetyādinā /
SA15dhnyabpu:3769: etaduktaṃ bhavati- trirūpaliṅgaṃ vaktukāmena sphuṭaṃ tad vaktavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3770: evaṃ ca tat sphuṭamuktaṃ bhavati yadi tacca, tatpratirūpakaṃ cocyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3778: sādhanasya ābhāsaḥ sadṛśaṃ sādhanasya, na sādhanamityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3781: kasya? ityāha- pratipāvayasya prativādinaḥ pratipādakasya ca vādino hetvābhāsaḥ // 56 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3782: 57 ekasya svarūpasya dharmisambandhasyāsiddhau sandehe vāsiddho hetvābhāsaḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:3783: 58 yathā- anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti sādhye cākṣuṣatvamubhayāsiddham //
SA15dhnyabpu:3784: 59 cetanāstaravaḥ iti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇaṃ prativādayasiddham /
SA15dhnyabpu:3790: tasyāsiddhau sandehe cāsiddho nāma hetvābhāso bhavati // 57 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3793: yadi digambarairuktam-vṛkṣāḥ cetanāḥ sarvatvagapaharaṇai maraṇāt iti bauddhaiḥ prayogate,
SA15dhnyabpu:3796: atha kasyaikasya rūpasyāsiddhau sandehe vā kisaṃjñako hetvabhāsaḥ?
SA15dhnyabpu:3799: dharmiṇi sattvaṃ hetoḥ tasya asiddhau sandehe vā asiddhasaṃjñako hetvābhāsaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3801: na sādhyasya, na viruddhasya, na saṃśayasya hetuḥ, api tvapratipattihetuḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3805: anityaḥ śabda ityanityatvaviśiṣṭe śabde sāvye cākṣuṣatvaṃ cakṣurgrāhyatvaṃ śabde dvayorapi vādiprativādinora siddham // 58 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3808: sarvā tvak sarvatvak tasyā apaharaṇe sati maraṇaṃ digambarairūpanyastaṃ prativādino bauddhasya asiddham /
SA15dhnyabpu:3810: vijñānaṃ cendriyaṃ cāyuśceti dvandvaḥ tatra vijñānaṃ cakṣurādijanitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3811: rūpādivijñānotpattyā yadanumitaṃ kāryāntarbhūtaṃ cakṣurgolakādisthitaṃ rūpaṃ tad indriyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3816: sa lakṣaṇaṃ tattvaṃ yasya tat tathoktamḥ tathābhūtasya maraṇasyānena bauddhena pratijñātatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:3817: 60 acetanāḥ sukhādayaḥ iti sādhye utpattimattvamanityatvaṃ vā sāṅkhayasya svayaṃ vādino 'siddham //
SA15dhnyabpu:3818: vijñānaṃ ca indriyāṇi ca āyuśceti vigrahaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3820: sa eva lakṣaṇaṃ yasya maraṇasya tad vijñānendriyāyunirodhalakṣaṇaṃ maraṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3823: tādṛśaṃ hi maraṇaṃ vṛkṣeṣu na sambhavatīti // 59 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3826: tadā sukhādiṣūtpattiranityatvaṃ vā sāṅkhayānāṃ svayamevāsiddhamḥ tasya hi kimapi notpadyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:3828: yadi nāmaivam, tathāpi kathamasiddham? ityāha- tasya ca vijñānādinirodhātmakasya taruṣvasambhavāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:3830: tataśca yo vijñānanirodhaṃ taruṣviccet, sa kathaṃ vijñānaṃ neccet /
SA15dhnyabpu:3832: nanu ca śoṣo 'pi maraṇamucyate, sa ca taruṣu siddhaḥ?
SA15dhnyabpu:3833: satyamḥ kevalaṃ vijñānasattayā vyāptaṃ yat maraṇaṃ tadiha hetuḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3837: digambarastu sādhyena vyāptavyāptaṃ vā maraṇamavivicya maraṇamātraṃ hetumāha /
SA15dhnyabpu:3838: tadasya vādino hetubhūtaṃ maraṇaṃ na jñātam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3840: śoṣarūpasya maraṇasya taruṣu darśanāt prativādinastu jñātam, ato 'siddham /
SA15dhnyabpu:3841: yadā tu vādino 'pi jñātam, tadā vādino 'pyasiddhaṃ syāditi nyāyaḥ // 59 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3844: teṣāmacaitanye sādhye utpattimattvam, anityatvaṃ vā liṅgamupanyastam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3845: ya utpattimanto 'nityā vā te na cetanāḥ, yathā rūpādayaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3846: tathā ca- utpatti manto 'nityā vā sukhādayaḥ tasmādacetanāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3848: atra cotpattimattvamanityatvaṃ vā paryāyeṇa hetuḥ na yugapat /
SA15dhnyabpu:3849: tacca dvayamapi sāṃkhyasya vādino na siddham /
SA15dhnyabpu:3851: tena yaḥ parasya siddhaḥ sa heturvaktavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3852: parasya cāsata utpatimattvam, sataśca niranvayo vināśo 'nityatvaṃ siddham /
SA15dhnyabpu:3858: yadā hetorātmanastadadhikaraṇasya vās andehaḥ, tadā asiddhaetvābhāso bhavati // 61 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3860: vāṣpa ādiryasya sa vāṣpādiḥ, teṣāṃ bhāvo vāṣpādibhāvaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3864: asau vāṣpo vā dhūlirvā kuhelikā vā?
SA15dhnyabpu:3873: yadi tvanityatvotpattimattvayoḥ prāmāṇyaṃ vādinā jñātaṃ syāt, tadā vādino 'pi siddhaṃ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:3879: āśrīyate 'smin heturityāśrayaṇam, hetorvyatirikta āśrayabhūtaḥ sadhyadharmī kathyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3880: tatra hi heturvartamāno gamakatvenāśrīyate tasyaśrayaṇasya sandehe sandigdhaḥ // 61 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3882: vāṣpa ādiryasya sa vāṣpādiḥ, tadbhāvena vāṣpāditvena sandihyamāno bhūtasaṅghāta iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3885: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadā dhūmo 'pi vāṣpāditvena sandigdho bhavati, tadāsiddhaḥ, gamakarūpāniścayāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:3887: yadātu sandigdhaḥ, tadā na gamakaḥ- ityasiddhatākhyo doṣaḥ // 62 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3890: parvato paribhāgena tiryaṅnirgatena praccādito bhūbhāgo nikuñjaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3895: 65 dhamyaṃsiddhāvapyasiddhaḥ- yathā sarvagata ātmā iti sadhye sarvatro palabhyamānaguṇatvam //
SA15dhnyabpu:3896: kathaṃ sandigdha iti cet? āha- tadeti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3898: sa hi mayūradhvaniḥ kasmānnikuñjapradeśānniḥ saratītyatra saṃśaya eva / 64 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3905: tathāhi- sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvaṃ yasya dharma uktaḥ sa ātmaiva nāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3908: te ca sarvadeśasya eva devadatta upalabhyante /
SA15dhnyabpu:3910: yasmāttasya guṇāḥ sarvatropalabhyante, tasmāt nūnamātmā sarvatra sthita iti // 65 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3912: tasya kekāyitasya āpāta āgamanam, tasya deśaḥ sa ucyate yasmād deśādāgaccati kekāyitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3914: nirantareṣu bahuṣu nikuñjeṣu satsu yadā kekāyitāpātanikuñje vibhramaḥ- kimasmānnikuñjāt kekāyitamāgatam?
SA15dhnyabpu:3921: sarvatra deśe upalabhyamānāḥ sukhaduḥkheccārāgadveṣādayo guṇā yasyātmanastasya bhāvastattvam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3922: na guṇā guṇinamantareṇa vartante, guṇānāṃ guṇini samavāyāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:3925: kathaṃ darkṣiṇāpathe upalabdhaḥ dukhādayo madhyadeśe upalabhyeran tasmāt sarvagata ātmā /
SA15dhnyabpu:3927: kimuta sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvaṃ sidhyet tasya ityasiddhau hetvābhāsaḥ pūrvamāśrayaṇasandehena dharmiṇi sandeha uktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3931: 67 yathā śabdasyānityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvādiko dharmaḥ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatraikadeśe vā vartamānaḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:3936: śabdo 'nityaḥ prameyatvāt iti sādhye prameyatvaṃ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatrāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3937: śabdo na prayatnāntarīyakaḥ anityatvāt iti sādhye,
SA15dhnyabpu:3938: anityatyatvaṃ sapakṣasya ekadeśe vipakṣasya ca sarvatraivāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3941: eko 'nta ekāntaḥ= niścayaḥ, sa prayojanamasyeti aikāntikaḥ, naikāntiko 'naikāntikaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3942: yasmānna sādhyasya na viparyayasya niścayaḥ, api tu tadviparītaḥ saṃśayaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3946: ādi śabdādaprayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca parigṛhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3948: ādi śabdādanityatvam, punaranityatvam, amūrtatvaṃ ca gṛhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:3949: śabdasya dharmiṇo 'nityatvādike dharme sādhye prametvādiko dharmo 'naikāntikaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3951: tathā hi- anityaḥ śabdaḥ, prameyatvāt, ghaṭavat ākāśavat- iti prameyatvaṃ sapakṣavipakṣavyapi /
SA15dhnyabpu:3953: anityavāda vidyudākāśavad ghaṭavacca ityanityatvaṃ sapakṣaikadeśavṛtti vidyudādāvasti,
SA15dhnyabpu:3957: vidyudādāvasti, nākāśādauḥ, sapakṣavyāpi sarvatra prayatnāntarīyake bhāvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:3961: ubhayorekadeśe ākāśe karmaṇi ca vartateḥ paramāṇau tu
SA15dhnyabpu:3963: 69 yathā asarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimān veti sādhye vaktṛtvādiko dharmaḥ sandigdhavipakṣavāvṛttikaḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:3964: sādhye, anityatvaṃ upakṣasya sarvatra vipakṣasya caikadeśe 'sti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3965: śabdo nityaḥ, asparśāt iti sādhye, sparśābhāvaḥ sapakṣavipakṣayorubhayokadeśe 'sti /
SA15dhnyabpu:3969: kenacid vivakṣitaḥ- kaścit puruṣo na sarvajño vaktṛtvāt tathā rāgādimān vā vaktṛtvādeva iti ucyamāne tasya vaktṛtvādidharmo 'naikāntika eva /
SA15dhnyabpu:3970: sa cānaikāntikaḥ kinnāmaka iti cet? āha- sandigdhetyādi /
SA15dhnyabpu:3971: vipakṣād vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā asyeti sa sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:3973: sarvajñaḥ kaścid vaktā na dṛśyate iti adarśane 'pi vyatireka siddhirna bhavati // 69 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3974: sapakṣaikadeśe ghaṭādau ca vipakṣaikadeśe na vartateḥ, mūrtatvād ghaṭaparamāṇuprabhatīnām /
SA15dhnyabpu:3976: asya caturvidhasya pakṣadharmasyasattvamasiddhaṃ vipakṣe / tato 'naikānti katā // 67 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3985: rāga ādiryasya dveṣādeḥ sa rāgādiḥ, sa yasyāsti sa rāgādimān iti dvitīyaṃ sādhyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:3987: tato 'sarvajñatve rāgādimattve vā sādhye prakṛte vaktṛtvam= vacanaśaktiḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:3992: ato na jñāyateki vaktā sarvajñaḥ? uta asarvajñaḥ?- ityanaikāntikaṃ vaktṛtvam // 69 //
SA15dhnyabpu:3993: 70 sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyate ityevamprakārasyānu palambhasyādṛśyātmaviṣayatvena sandehahetutvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:3995: 71 vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayovirodhābhāvācca yaḥ sarvajñaḥsa vaktā na bhavatītya darśane 'pi vyatireko na siddhayati, sandehāt //
SA15dhnyabpu:4000: adṛśyaviṣayānupalambhaḥ saṃśayasyaiva heturiti asarvajñaparyayāt sarvajñāt vaktṛtvalakṣaṇahetornivṛttiḥ sandigdhaiva // 70 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4005: tasmāt- sarvajñasya vakturadarśane 'pi vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayovirodhābhāvād vaktṛtvasya sarvajñatvād vyāvṛttiriti na sidhyati sandehasattvāt // 71 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4006: nanu ca sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyate, tat kathaṃ vacanaṃ sarvajñe sandigdham?
SA15dhnyabpu:4007: ata eva sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyate ityevamprakārasya evañjātīyasya anupalambhasya sandehahetutvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:4008: kutaḥ? ityāha- adṛśya ātbhā viṣayo yasya tasya bhāvo 'dṛśyātmaviṣayatvam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4012: nānupalambhāt sarvajñe vaktṛtvamasad brūmaḥ, apitu sarvajñatvena saha vaktṛtvasya virodhāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:4015: virodhābhāvācca kāraṇāt vyatireko na sidhyati- iti sambandhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4016: vyāptimantaṃ vyatirekaṃ darśayati- yaḥ sarvajña iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4017: sadhyābhāvarūpaṃ sarvajñatvamanūdya sa vaktā na bhavati iti sādhanasya vaktṛtvasyābhāvo vidhīyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4018: tena sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyatatvāt sādhanābhāvena vyāpta ukta iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4019: vyāptimānīdṛśo vyatireko virodhe sati vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayoḥ sidhyet /
