SA15dhnyabpu:4487: yataśca na kvacid bhāvābhāvaniścayaḥ, tata evānvayavyatirekayoḥ sandehaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4490: sādhyasya itarasya ca viruddhasya, ataḥ sandigdhānvayavyatirekānniścayābhāvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:4491: sapakṣavipaksayorhi sadasattvasandehe na sādhyasya na viruddhasya siddhiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4492: na ca sātmakānātmakābhyāṃ paraḥ prakāraḥ sambhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:4493: tataḥ prāṇādimattvād dharmiṇī jīvaccarīre saṃśaya ātmabhāvābhāvayoḥ- ityanaikāntikaḥ prāṇādiriti // 108 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4494: trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāmasiddhau sandehe ca hetudoṣānupapādyopasaṃharannāha- eva-
SA15dhnyabpu:4498: siddhiḥ sandeho vā, kvacitu dvayo rūpayoḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4504: yadā- viruddhaścasau na vyabhicarituṃ śīlaṃ cāsyeti viruddhāvyabhicārī /
SA15dhnyabpu:4508: tacca kasmāditi cet? āha- anumāna iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4510: kathamasambhava iti cet? āha- na hīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4513: eṣāṃ madhya ekaikaṃ rūpaṃ yadā asiddhaṃ sandigdhaṃ vā bhavati,
SA15dhnyabpu:4514: dve dvau vāsiddhe sandigdhe vā bhavataḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:4517: yasyāsiddhau sandehe vā yo hetvābhāso yujyate sa tasyāsiddheḥ sandehācca vyavasthāpyata iti yasya yasya yena yena yogo yathāyogamiti // / 109 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4519: hetvantarasādhitasya viruddhaṃ yat tanna vyabhicaratīti viruddhābhicārī /
SA15dhnyabpu:4520: yadi vā viruddhaścāsau sādhanāntarasiddhasya dharmasya viruddhasādhanāt,
SA15dhnyabpu:4522: satyam, ukta ācaryeṇa, mayā tu noktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4529: pramāṇasiddhe hi trairūpye prastute sa eva hetvābhāsaḥ sambhavati yasya pramāṇasiddhaṃ rūpam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4541: tathā hi śiśapayā vṛkṣasaṃsiddhau vijātīyavṛkṣasādhanaṃ yathoktalakṣaṇasya dvitīyasyasambhavaḥ // 112 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4542: yadyuktalakṣaṇeṣu triṣu asambhavaḥ, astu tarhi aparatra sambhava iti cet? tatrāha- na ceti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4543: triṣu hetuṣu anantabhūtamavyabhicārihetvantaraṃ nāsti yasmin viruddhāvyabhicārisambhavaḥ // 113 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4544: kasmāttriṣu asambhava iti ced? āha- tasmāditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:4545: yatra atibaddhena pramāṇena na nirṇayastad avastudarśanabalapravṛttamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4553: sa kathamātmakāraṇaṃ vyāpakaṃ ca svabhāvaṃ parityajya bhaved,
SA15dhnyabpu:4558: syādetat, etebhyo 'nyo bhaviṣyati? ityāha- na cānya etebhyo 'vyabhicārī tribhyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4560: kva tarhyācāryadiṅnagenāyaṃ hetudoṣa uktaḥ? ityāha- tasmāditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:4561: yasmād vastubalapravṛtte 'numāne na sambhavati tasmād āgamāśrayānumānamāśritya viruddhāvyabhicāyuktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4562: āgamasiddhaṃ hi yasyānumānasya liṅgatrairūpyaṃ tasyāgama āśrayaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4563: nanu cāgamasiddhamapi trairūpyaṃ pramāṇasiddhaḥ? ityāha- avastudarśanabalapravṛttamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4566: tataḥ pravṛttam apramāṇād vikalpamātrād vyavasthitaṃ trairūpyamāgamasiddhamanumānasya, na tu pramāṇāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:4571: 117 tatrodāharaṇam- yat sarvadeśasthitaḥ svasambandhibhiyugapadabhisambadhyate tat sarvagatam yathākāśam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4572: abhisambadhyate ca sarvadeśāvasthitaḥ svasambandhibhiyu gapat sāmānyamiti //
SA15dhnyabpu:4573: āgamārthavicāreṣu / viruddhāvyabhicārī sādhanadoṣa ukta iti / sugamam // 114 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4574: yadyayamayogya eva, tarhi āgamāśrayānumāne 'pi tasya kathaṃ sambhava iti ced? āha- śāstreti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4575: sarvaiśca śāstrakāraistaddarśanānutpannā api kecana arthāḥ svabhāvaviparyayeṇābhihitā bavanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4578: tarhi vastubalena pravṛttirapi kasmānneṣyate iti cet/ tatrāha- na hīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4584: tathā svabhāva- kārya anupalambhahetavaste vyāvsthitā teṣu viruddhāvyabhicāriṇaḥ kutaḥ sambhavaḥ // 116 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4587: yat sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ distasya vicāreṣu prakrānteṣu āgamāśrayamanumānaṃ sambhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:4596: yadi śāstrakṛto 'pi bhrāntāḥ, punaranyeṣvapi puruṣeṣu ka āśvāsaḥ? ityāha- na hīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4597: na hetuṣu kalpanayā hetutvavyavasthā, api tu vastusthityā /
SA15dhnyabpu:4599: avasthitaṃ paramārthasadvastu tadanatikrāntā yathāvasthitā vastusthitiḥ= vyavasthā yeṣāṃ te yathāvasthidavastusthitayaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4600: te hi yathā vastu sthitaṃ tathā sthitāḥ, na kalpanayā /
SA15dhnyabpu:4601: tatasteṣu na bhrānteravakāśo 'sti, yena viruddhāvyabhicāri sambhavaḥ syāt // 116 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4605: ta eva svasya ca sambandhinaḥ svasamtandhinaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4606: yadapi vastu sarvadeśāvasthitasvasambandhibhiyu gapadabhisambadhyate tat sarvagatameva dṛṣṭam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4608: ākāśaṃ hi sarvadeśāvasthitasvasambandhibhiryu gapadabhisambadhyate tacca sarvagatameveṣṭam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4611: sāmānyasya sambandhino hi vyaktiviśeṣāḥ sarveṣu vidyamānāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4616: tatsambandhināṃ svabhāvamātramanubandhu śīlaṃ yasyā sā tatsambandhisvabhavamātrānubandhinī /
SA15dhnyabpu:4619: taddeśannihitaḥ svabhāvo yasya sa taddeśasanni hitasvabhāvaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4623: yat sarvasmit deśe 'vasthitaiḥ svasambandhibhiryu gapadabhisambaddhayate iti sarvadeśāvasthitairabhisambadhyamānatvaṃ sāmānyasya anūdaya sarvagatatvaṃ vidhīyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4624: tena yugapadabhisambadhyamānatvaṃ sarvagatatve niyataṃ tena vyāptaṃ kathyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4625: iha sāmānyaṃ kaṇādamaharṣiṇā niṣkriyaṃ dṛśyamekaṃ coktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4626: yugapacca sarvaiḥ svaiḥ sambandhibhiḥ samavāyena sambaddham /
SA15dhnyabpu:4627: tatra pailukena kaṇādaśiṣyeṇa vyaktiṣu vyaktirahiteṣu ca deśeṣu sāmānyaṃ sthitaṃ sādhayituṃ pramāṇamidamupanyastam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4630: ākāśamapi hi sarvadeśāvasthitaivṛkṣādibhiḥ svasaṃyogibhiryugapadabhisambadhyamānaṃ sarvagataṃ ca /
SA15dhnyabpu:4634: teṣāṃ sarvadeśāvasthitānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ sambandhī sāmānyasya svabhāvaḥ sa eva tatsambandhisvabhāvamātram,
SA15dhnyabpu:4638: taddeśe sannihitaḥ svabhāvo yasya tat taddeśannihitasva-
SA15dhnyabpu:4639: 119 na hi yo yatra nāsti sa taddśamātmanā vyāpnotīti svabhāvahetuprayoga iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4640: 120 dvitīyo 'pi prayogaḥ- yadupalabdhilakṣaprāptaṃ sannipalamyate na tat tannāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4643: ayamanupalambhah svabhāvaśca parasparaviruddhāsāthanāde katra saṃśayaṃ janayataḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:4644: sarvagatatvenava hi sambandhino vyāpyante ityetacca kasmāditi cet? āha- ya iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4645: yaśca yatra nāsti tasya taddeśavyāpannaṃ kathaṃ śakyam? taddeśa iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4646: sa deśo yasya sa taddeśa iti yasmin deśe sa nāsti taddeśasambandhinaṃ sa na saknoti vyāpayitumīt śeṣaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4655: tat kathaṃ tatsambandhitvāt taddeśatvam? ityāha- na hīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4656: yo yatra deśe nāsti sa deśo yasya sa taddeśaḥ taṃ na vyāpnotītyātmanā svarūpeṇa /
SA15dhnyabpu:4657: iha sāmānyasya tadvatāṃ ca samavāyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhah, sa cābhinnadeśayoreva /
SA15dhnyabpu:4658: tena yatra tay samavetaṃ tat tadātmīyena rūpeṇa kroḍīkurvat samavāyirūpa deśe svātmānaṃ niveśayati /
SA15dhnyabpu:4660: tasmād yat tatra samavetaṃ tat tad dravyaṃ vyāpnuvadātmā taddeśe sannihitaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:4662: taddeśasattābhāve tadvayāpanābhāvāt vyāpanalakṣaṇaḥ samavāyasambandho na syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:4667: etena dṛśyānupalabdhimanūdaya na tat tatrāsti ityasadvayavahāryatvaṃ vihitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4671: tāvatā nārthapratītiriti na pṛthagdṛṣṭānto nāma sādhanāvayavaḥ kaścit /
SA15dhnyabpu:4673: nyasya kevalāśrayasarvagatatvamevāṅgīkṛtam, tannayapradarśanārthamāha- dvitīya iti / tacca sugamam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4680_0: prākca svabhāvahetunā sarvasarvagatatvaṃ sādhitamiti dvābhyāṃ parasparaviruddhārthasādhanāt
SA15dhnyabpu:4680_2: anubaddhatvāt sarvasarvagatatvameva veti anubhavādekasminneva sāmānye sandehī jāyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4682: nanun dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇaṃ kasmānnoktamiti cet? tatrāha- trirūpa iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4683: pūrva hetorlakṣaṇatrayaṃ yaduktaṃ tenaiva rūpatrayeṇa sādhyārthasiddhirbhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:4684: tena dṛṣṭānto nāma pṛthak sādhanāvayavo nāsti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4688: dṛśyamapi kasyāñcid vyaktī gosāmānyamaśvādiṣu vyaktyantareṣu vyaktiśūnye cākāśe nopalabhyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4690: ayamanupalambhaḥ pūrvoktaśca svabhāvaḥ parasya viruddhau yavathau tayoḥ sādhanāt tāvekasmin dharmiṇi saṃśayaṃ janayataḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4692: ekena cātra vyaktyantareṣu vyaktiśūnye cākāśe sattvam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4694: na caikasyaikasaikatra sattvamasattvaṃ ca yuktamḥ tayovirodhāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:4695: tadāgamasiddhasya sāmānyasya sarvagatatvāsarvagatatvayoḥ sādhyayoreto viruddhāvyabhicāriṇī jātau /
SA15dhnyabpu:4699: tataḥ śāstrakārreṇaiva viruddhavyaptatvamapaśyatā viruddhavyāptī dharmāvuktvā viruddhāvyabhicāryavakāśo datta iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4702: nanu ca sādhanāvayavatvād yathā hetava uktāḥ, tatprasaṅgena ca hetvā-
SA15dhnyabpu:4703: 122 hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvamasapakṣācca sarvato vyāvṛtto rūpamuktamabhedena /
SA15dhnyabpu:4705: tacca darśayatā- yatra dhūmastatrāgniḥ, asatyagnau na kvacid dhūmaḥ, yathā mahānasetarayoḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4709: prayogamātra etadeva hetorlakṣaṇam- sapakṣa eva sattvam ityevarūpam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4710: tathā sarvasmād vipakṣād vyāvṛtiḥ ityevaṃrūpam ca /
SA15dhnyabpu:4711: viśeṣeṇa ca hetorlakṣaṇam- kāryahetorjanma pradarśanīyam ityuktam,
SA15dhnyabpu:4714: kāryahetorhi svakīyakṣaṇaṃ(viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ) tathā sāmānaylakṣaṇaṃ ca yogyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4715: evaṃ ca darśayatā viśeṣeṇa kathayatā ityarthaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4717: bhāsāḥ, tathā sādhanāvayatvād dṛṣṭāntā vaktavyāḥ tatprasaṅgena ca dṛṣṭāntā bhāṣāḥ tat kathaṃ noktāḥ?
SA15dhnyabpu:4718: ityāha- trirūpo heturuktaḥ, tat ki dṛṣṭāntaiḥ?
SA15dhnyabpu:4719: syādetat, tāvatā nārthapratītiḥ? ityāha- tāvatā ceti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4720: uktalakṣaṇenaiva hetunā bhavati sādhyapratītiḥ, ataḥ sa eva gamakaḥ, tatastadvacanameva gamakam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4722: yataścārya nāvayavaḥ, tena nāsya dṛṣṭāntasya lakṣaṇaṃ hetulakṣaṇāt pṛthagucyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4723: kathaṃ tarhi hetorvyāptiniśrayaḥ, yadyadṛṣṭāntako heturiti ced?
SA15dhnyabpu:4724: nocyate heturadṛṣṭāntaka eva, api tu na hetoḥ pṛthagdṛṣṭānto nāma /
SA15dhnyabpu:4726: ata evoktam- nāsya pṛthag lakṣaṇamucyate iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4728: yadyevam, hetūpayogino 'pi lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyameva? ityāha- gatārthatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:4729: gato 'rthaḥ prayojanam, abhidheyaṃ vā yasya dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇasya, tat tathā /
SA15dhnyabpu:4738: sādhāraṇaṃ kārya svabhāva anupalambhanāmetallakṣaṇamityarthaḥ / kiṃ punastat?
SA15dhnyabpu:4740: na hyanyathā sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre śakye darśayitum /
SA15dhnyabpu:4744: tathaiva vyāvṛtti kathayatāpyavaśyaṃ yathā jalam ityābhidheyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4746: anena svabhāvahetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca yathā vaktavyaṃ tathā darśyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4747: iha yadi yathā ghaṭaḥ iti nocyate tadā sapakṣasattvameva kathayituṃ na śakyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4748: yadi yathā ākāśam iti nocyate, tadā vyāvṛttirapi kathayituṃ na śakyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4750: tathāhi yadi yatra yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatra tatrāvaśyaṃ nityatvam,
SA15dhnyabpu:4753: sapakṣa eva yat sattvam, vipakṣācca sarvasmād vyāvṛttiryā- rūpadvayametadabhedenoktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4754: naca sāmānyamuktamapi śakyaṃ jñātum, atastadeva viśeṣaniṣṭhaṃ vaktavyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4755: ataḥ punarapi viśeṣeṇa viśeṣavantau janmatanmātrānubandhau darśanīyāvaktau /
SA15dhnyabpu:4757: janmani hi jñāte kāryasya sapakṣe eva sattvam, vipakṣācca sarvasmād vyāvṛttirjñātā bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:4764: sādhanasya yadā svabhāvo jñāto bhavati tadā svabhāvahetoḥ- sapakṣe eva sattvam,
SA15dhnyabpu:4766: tadevaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣātmakaṃ jñātavyam, nānaythā / tato viśeṣalaksāṇamuktam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4768: tacca sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ darśayitukāmena viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ darśayatā eva darśanīyam- iti sambandhaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4772: tato yathā mahānasa iti darśanīyam, asatyagnau na bhavatyeva dhūma iti vyatireko darśitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4776: vyāptiḥ / asmiścārthe darśite eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati / etāvanmātrarūpatvāt tasyeti //
SA15dhnyabpu:4777: sapakṣatvaṃ darśayatā yadi yathā mahānasaḥ yathā ghaṭaḥ iti vā nocyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:4779: yadi ca vipakṣāsattvaṃ darśayatā yathā jalam yathā ākāśam iti vā nicyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:4783: tasya kārya tatkāryam, tasya bhāvastatkāryatā, tasyā niyamaḥ tatkāryatāniyamaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4784: kāraṇasattve kāryasyāpi sattvam ityeṣa niyama eva tatkāryatāniyamaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4788: yadā yathoktanyāyena kvacid dharmiṇi hetuḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇato viśeṣalakṣaṇataścocyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:4793: anityatvābhāve na bhavatyena kṛtakatvamiti vyatireko darśitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4795: prasiddhavyāptikasya ca hetoḥ sādhyani vṛttau nivṛttirniyatā darśanīyā /
SA15dhnyabpu:4796: tadavaśyaṃ yathā ghaṭe, yathā ākāśe ceti darśanīyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4798: yasmādanyathā sāmānya lakṣaṇarūpe sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre iti niyate- sapakṣe eva sattvam,
SA15dhnyabpu:4801: viśeṣalakṣaṇe hi darśite yathoktaprakāre sadasatve darśite bhavataḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4805: saiva niyamo yatastatkāryatāyā dhūmo dahane niyataḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4807: svabhāvaliṅgasya ca svabhāvena sādhyena vyāpti viśeṣalakṣaṇarūpā na śakyā darśayitum /
SA15dhnyabpu:4808: yasmāt kāryakāraṇabhāvastādātmyaṃ ca mahānase ghaṭe ca jḥātavyam,
SA15dhnyabpu:4809: tasmād vyāptisādhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśayatā sādharmyadṛṣṭānto darśanīyaḥ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntastu prasiddhe tatkāryatve kāraṇābhāve kāryābhāvapratipattyartham /
SA15dhnyabpu:4814: 124 yathā nityaḥ śabdo 'mūrtatvāt, karmavat paramāṇuvad ghaṭavaditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:4817: yatra sādhyena hetoranvayo dṛśyate, sa sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4818: yatra ca sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvo nirdiśyate sa vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ // 122 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4819_0: yasmād yadā hetoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇayonirdeśaḥ kriyate sa nirduṣṭhadṛṭānta ityucyate
SA15dhnyabpu:4819_1: tasmād yatra tallakṣaṇayornirdeśo na sambhavati sa dṛṣṭāntābhāso bhavatītyuktaṃ bhavati // 123 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4822: śabdo nityaḥ, amūrtatvat karmavat iti sādhaydharmavikalaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4826: tasmād dṛṣṭāntamantareṇa na hetoranvayo vyatireko vā śakyo darśayitum /
SA15dhnyabpu:4827: ato heturūpākhyānādeva hetorvyāptisādhanasya pramāṇasya darśakaḥ sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4828: prasiddhavyāptikasya sādhyābhave hetvabhāvapradarśanād vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta upādeya iti ca darśitaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhnyabpu:4830: yo 'yamartho vyāpti prasādhanapramāṇapradarśanaḥ kaścidupādeyo nivṛttipradarśanaśca- ityasminnarthe darśite darśito dṛṣṭānta ityāha /
SA15dhnyabpu:4831: etābandhamātraṃ rūpaṃ yasya, tasya bhāvastattvam, tasmāditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:4834: prasiddhavyāptikasya ca sādhyanivṛtau sādhananivṛttipradarśakatvam- ityetad vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasya /
SA15dhnyabpu:4836: etenaiva ca heturūpākhyānād dṛṣṭāntatvapradarśanena dṛṣṭāntadoṣā dṛṣṭāntabhāsāḥ kathitā bhavanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4837: tathā hi- pūrviktisiddhaye ya upādīyamāno 'pi dṛṣṭānto na samarthaḥ svakārya sādhayituṃ sa dṛṣṭāntadoṣa iti sāmarthyāduktaṃ bhavati // 123 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4840: sādharmyeṇa karmavat, paramāṇuvat, ghaṭavadityete dṛṣṭāntā upanyastāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4848: yathā- yo vaktā sa rāgādimān iṣṭapuruṣavat /
SA15dhnyabpu:4850: sandigdhaḥ sādhyadharmo 'sminniti vigrahaḥ / sādhyadharma ādiryeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4863: tena tatra vacanarāgādayorvyāpyavyapakabhavaḥ kārya kāraṇabhāvo vā naiva vidyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:4864: anitya iti / ihānvayo vidyamāno 'pi na pradarśitaḥ // 126 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4865: ubhayaṃ ceti ca tairvikalāḥ / 1 sādhyavikalaṃ karma tasyāniyatatvāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:4872: tathā sandigdhaḥ sādhyadharmo yasmin sa sandigdhasādhyadharmaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4879: maraṇe dharmo 'syeti maraṇadharmā, tasya bhāvo maraṇadharmatvaṃ sādhyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4882: tadubhayamapi rathyāpuruṣe dṛṣṭānte sandigdham- asarvajñatvaṃ rāgādimatvaṃ ceti // 125 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4884: yasmin dṛṣṭānte sādhyasādhanayorasambhavamātre dṛśyate, natu sādhyena vyāpto hetuḥ so 'nanvayaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4885: apradarśitānvayaśca yasmin dṛṣṭānte vidyamāno 'pyanvayo na pradarśito vaktrā, so 'pradarśitānvayaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4891: viparīteti / anvayo viparīto yasmin dṛṣṭānte iti vigrahaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4893: iha yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityam iryāmadheye yadanityaṃ tatkṛtakam iti viparītābhidhānam // 127 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4905: tathāpi nānityatvenāpi sadṛśaḥ pratyetu śakyate, atiprasaṅgāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:4906: yadi tu kṛtakatvamanityasvabhavaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati, evaṃ kṛtakatvādanityatvapratītiḥ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:4907: tasmād yat kṛtakaṃ tadani tyam iti kṛtakatvamanityatve niyatamabhidhāya niyamasadhanāyānvayavākyārthapratipattiviṣayo dṛṣṭānta upādeyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4911: na ca sādharmyāt sādhyasiddhirato 'nvayārtho dṛṣṭāntastadarthaścānena nopāttaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4914: tato yadi nāma na duṣṭāṃ vastu, tathāpi vaktrā duṣṭāṃ darśitatamiti duṣṭameva // 126 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4915: tathā viparīto 'nvayo yasmin dṛṣṭānte sa tathoktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4921: tato yādṛśamiha kṛtakatvamaniyata manityatve darśitam, tādṛśānnāstyanityatvapratītiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4922: tathāhi- yadanityamityanityatvamanūdaya tat kṛtakamiti kṛtakatvaṃ vihitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4923: ato 'nityatvaṃ niyatamuktaṃ kṛtakatve, na tu kṛtakatvamanityatve /
SA15dhnyabpu:4927: yadyapi ca kṛtakatvaṃ vastusthityānityatve niyatam, tathāpyaniyataṃ vaktra darśitam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4938: te ca yatra santi te sādhyādyavaytirekiṇah /
SA15dhnyabpu:4952: nityatve śabdasya sādhye hetāvamūrtatve paramāṇuvaidharmye dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyāvyatirekī nityatvāt paramāṇūnām karma sādhanāvyatireki /
SA15dhnyabpu:4961: sandigdhaḥ sādhyavyatireko yasmin sa sandigdhasādhyavyatirekaḥ, sa ādiryeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:4963: asarvajñā ityekaṃ sādhyam, anāptā akṣīṇadoṣā iti dvitīyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4966: āptatā ca tayorliṅgabhūtaḥ pramāṇatiśayo liṅgātmakaḥ pramāṇaviśeṣo 'vidayamānaḥ sarvajñatāptatāliṅgabhūtaḥ pramāṇātiśayo yasmin tathoktaṃ śāsanam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4967: tādṛśaṃ śāsanaṃ teṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ teṣāṃ bhāvastattvam /
SA15dhnyabpu:4970: atra vaidharmyodaharaṇam- yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotirjñānādikamupadiṣṭavān /
SA15dhnyabpu:4973: 131 sandigdhasādhanavyatireko yathā- na trayīvidā rāmhaṇena grāhyavacanaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvaditi /
SA15dhnyabpu:4982: tasmāt te sarvajñā vītarāgā veti niścetuṃ śakyata iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4985: sandigdhetyadi / tadarthastu gata eva / udāharaṇam- yatheti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4986: hi kapilādayaḥ sarvajñā āptā vā syuḥ, tadā jyotirjñānādikaṃ kasmānno padiṣṭāvantaḥ?
SA15dhnyabpu:4987: na copadiṣṭāvantaḥ, tasmānna sarvajñā āptā vā /
SA15dhnyabpu:4989: vaidharmyodāharaṇam- yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotirjñānādikaṃ sarvajñatāptataliṅgabhūtamupadiṣṭāvān /
SA15dhnyabpu:4990: yathā ṛṣabho vardhamānaśca tāvādī yasya sa ṛṣabhvardhamānādirdigambarāṇāṃ śāstā sarvajñaśca āptaśceti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4991: tadiha vaidharmyodāharaṇam ṛṣabhāderasarvajñatvasyanāptatayāśca vyatireko vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā /
SA15dhnyabpu:4992: yato jyotirjñānaṃ copadiśet, asarvajñaśca bhaved anāptā vā /
SA15dhnyabpu:4993: ko 'tra virodhaḥ? naimittikametajjjñānaṃ vyabhicāri na sarvajñatvamanumāpayet // 130 //
SA15dhnyabpu:4994: sandigdhaḥ sādhanavyatireko yasmin sa tathoktaḥ? tamudāharati- yatheti /
SA15dhnyabpu:4995: ṛksāmayajūṣi trīṇi= trayī, tāṃ vettīti trayīvit /
SA15dhnyabpu:4996: tena na grāhyaṃ vacanaṃ yasyeti sādhyam /
SA15dhnyabpu:5000: atra pramāṇe vaidharmyodāharaṇam- sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāvena yatra vyāpto darśyate tad vaidharyodaharaṇam /
SA15dhnyabpu:5001: grāhyaṃ vacanaṃ yeṣāṃ te grāhyavacanā iti sādhyanivṛttimanūdaya na te rāgādimanta iti sādhanābhavo vihitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5002: gauramaraṇam- ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:5006: atra vaidharmyeṇodāharaṇam- yo vītarāgo na tasya parigrahāgrahaḥ, yatharṣabhāderiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:5013: tenatadukta bhavati- trayīvid yo brāmhaṇastadabhimatapuruṣavacanaṃ nityapramāṇaṃ nāstīti /
SA15dhnyabpu:5016: ye hi grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5018: gautama vyāsamuniprabhṛttibhiryāni dharmaśāstrāṇi praṇītāniv tāni hi trayīvidāṃ prāmāṇyavacanāni /
SA15dhnyabpu:5020: sandigdha ubhayorvyatireko yasminniti samāsaḥ / udāharaṇam- yatheti /
SA15dhnyabpu:5025: ādiryeṣāṃ te tathoktā manbādayo dharmaśāstrāṇi= smṛtayasteṣāṃ kartāraḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5026: trayīvidā hi brāmhaṇena grāhyavacanā dharmaśāstrakṛto vītarāgāśca ta ītīha dharmī vyatirekaviṣayo gautamādaya iti /
SA15dhnyabpu:5028: yadyapi te grāhyavacanāstrayīvidā, tathapi ki sarāgā uta vītarāgāḥ? iti sandehaḥ // 131 //
SA15dhnyabpu:5035: svīkārādūrdhva yad gārdhya mātsarya sa āgrahaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5036: parigrahaśca āgrahaśca tabhyāṃ yogāt kapilādayo labhyamānaṃ svīkurvanti svīkṛtaṃ na muñcanti- iti te rāgādimanto gamyante /
SA15dhnyabpu:5037: atra pramāṇe vaidharmyodāharaṇam- yatra sāhdyābhāva sādhanābhavo darśayitavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5039: sādhyābhāvamanūdaya na tasya parigrahāgrahāviti sādhanābhavo vihitaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5041: etasmād ṛṣabhādedṛṣṭāntād avītarāgatvasya sādhyaparigrahāgrahayogasya ca sādhanasya nivṛttiḥ sandigdhā /
SA15dhnyabpu:5044: vaidharmyeṇodāharaṇam- yatrāvītarāgatvaṃ nāsti, na sa vaktā /
SA15dhnyabpu:5046: yadayapyupalakhaṇḍādubhayaṃ vyāvṛtaṃ tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptyā vyatirekāsiddheravyatirekaḥ //
SA15dhnyabpu:5047: 134 arpadarśitavyatireko yathā- anitya śabdaḥ, kṛtakatvādākāśavat iti vaidharmyeṇa //
SA15dhnyabpu:5048: ṛṣabhādayo hi svalpamatramapi vyañjanaṃ na parigṛhṇanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:5054: te ca sarve mānasattvāt indriyagocarā na bhavanti /
SA15dhnyabpu:5055: tasmāt ṛṣabhādibhyo vyāvṛttireveti niścetuṃ na śakyate // 132 //
SA15dhnyabpu:5063: tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptirasiddhā /
SA15dhnyabpu:5066: apradarśita iti / yatra vyatireko vartamāno 'pi nocyate /
SA15dhnyabpu:5068: yadi nāma tatsiddhānte vītarāgāśca niṣparigrahāśca paṭhayante, tathāpi sandeha eva // 132 //
SA15dhnyabpu:5069: aparānapi trīnudāhartumāha- avyatireka it avidyamāno vyatireko yasmin so 'vyatirekaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5080: yadyapi upalakhaṇḍādubhayaṃ vyavṛttam- sarāgatvaṃ vītarāgatvaṃ ca tathāpi vyaptyā vyatireko yastasyasiddheḥ kāraṇādavyatireko 'yam /
SA15dhnyabpu:5081: kīdṛśī punarvyāptiḥ? ityaha- sarvo vītarāga iti / sādhyābhāvānuvādaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5093: tathāhi yadi ye ye ca apdārthā nityāḥ te sarva evākṛtakāḥ ityucyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:5102: sa śuddho 'pi svato yadi pareṇāśuddhaḥ khyāpyate sa tāvad yathā prakāśitastathā na yuktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5105: ato vakturaparādhādapi parāthānumāne heturdṛṣṭānto vā duṣṭāḥ syādapi /
SA15dhnyabpu:5106: na ca sādṛśyādasādṛśyādvā sādhyapratipattiḥ, apitu sādhyaniyatāddhetoḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5107: ataḥ sādhyaniyato heturanvayavākyena, vyatirekavākyena vā vaktavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5111: na ceha vyatirekavākyaṃ prayuktam, ato vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta ihāsādṛśaymātreṇa sādhaka upanyastaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5113: vyatirekaviṣayatvena sa sādhakaḥ na ca tathopanyasta iti ayamapradarśitavyatireko vakturaparādhād duṣṭāḥ // 134 //
SA15dhnyabpu:5114: viparīto vyatireko yasmin vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte sa tathoktaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5118: tadā vyatirekavākye sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato darśayitavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5119: evaṃ hi hetuḥ sādhyaniyato darśitaḥ syāt /
SA15dhnyabpu:5120: yadi tu sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato nākhyāyate, sādhanasattāyāmapi sādhyābhvaḥ sambhāvyeta /
SA15dhnyabpu:5121: tathā ca sādhanaṃ sādhyaniyataṃ na pratīyeta /
SA15dhnyabpu:5123: viparītavyatireke ca sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhyābhāve niyata ucyate, na sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanā bhāve /
SA15dhnyabpu:5128: tathā ca sati akṛtakatvaṃ nityatve sādhyābhāve niyatamuktam, na nityatvaṃ sādhanābhāve /
SA15dhnyabpu:5130: 136 na hyebhirdṛṣṭāntābhāsairhetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣe ca sarvatrāsattvameva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā /
SA15dhnyabpu:5136: taiśca dṛṣṭāntābhāsairhetoyacca sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tadapi viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ tacca na śakyate darśayitum /
SA15dhnyabpu:5137: tata eva te dṛṣṭāntābhāsā iti dṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5138: yasmād dvividhamapi hetirlakṣaṇaṃ darśayituṃ na śakyate, tasmādarthāpattyā teṣāṃ nirāso draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5141: nyūnatā ādiryeṣāṃ te nyūnatādayaḥ / teṣāmuktinyūnatādyuktiḥ / tāśca pratyekaṃ dūṣaṇāḥ // 137 //
SA15dhnyabpu:5144: yena vacanena dosā uddhriyante tad dūṣaṇamiti /
SA15dhnyabpu:5149: ebhiśca hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣe ca sarvatrāsattvameva yat sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tat niścayena na śakyaṃ darśayitum /
SA15dhnyabpu:5150: nanu ca sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣaniyatameva pratipattavyam, na svata eva? ityāha- viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā /
SA15dhnyabpu:5151: yadi viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādayituṃ śakyeta, syādeva sāmānyalakṣaṇapratipattiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5157: dūṣaṇaṃ vaktumāha- duṣaṇeti / dūṣaṇā kā draṣṭavyā? nyūnatādonāmuktiḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5159: 138 ye pūrva nyūnatādayaḥ sādhanadoṣā uktāsteṣāmudbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇam tena pareṣṭārthasiddhipratibandhāt //
SA15dhnyabpu:5163: yasmāttena vacanena pūrvapakṣiṇā sādhayitumiṣṭasyārthasya siddhiḥ pratibadhyate,
SA15dhnyabpu:5167: kāśca punastā jātaya iti? āha- abhūteti /
SA15dhnyabpu:5168: na bhūto 'bhūtaḥ, abhūtā doṣā abhūtadoṣāḥ teṣāmudbhavanāni abhūtadoṣodbhāvanāni /
SA15dhnyabpu:5169: yaiśca vacanaiḥ sādhanadoṣā abidhyamānā api udbhāvyante tāni jātayo veditavyāḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5171: ucyate, dūṣaṇānāṃ tayā dūṣaṇābhāsānāṃ ca nirūpaṇe samyagjñānamapi sasahāyaṃ nirūpitaṃ bhavatoti /
SA15dhnyabpu:5172: tathā caitā hyatra dūṣaṇā iti tāsāṃ pariharo vidheyaḥ /
SA15dhnyabpu:5177: dūṣaṇaṃ vivarītumāha- ye pūrva nyūnatādayo 'siddhaviruddhānaikāntikā uktāḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:5179: nanu ca nyūnatādayo na viparyayasādhanāḥ, tat kathaṃ dūṣaṇam?
SA15dhnyabpu:5180: ityāha- tena nyūnatādivacanena pareṣāmiṣṭaścāsāvarthaśca tasya siddhiḥ niścayaḥ,
SA15dhnyabpu:5183: api tu parasyābhipretaniścayavibandhānniścayābhāvo bhavati niścayaviparyaya ityastyeva viparyayasiddhiriti // 138 //
SA15dhnyabpu:5196: pṛthu yaccājitaṃ puṇyaṃ nyāyabidoḥ padaṃ padam /
SA15dhnyabpu:5213: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hayavadat /
SA15dhnyabpu:5214: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
